eng: Look! It's disappearing!
jap: 見て！　消えてゆくわ！
re: Look! It's disappearing!

eng: It's disappearing!
jap: 消える！？　そんなバカな！
re: It's disappearing!? That can't be!

eng: What's happening?!
jap: コ、コレハ！？
re: TH, THIS is!?

eng: 'Tis disappearing!
jap: ！　消えてゆく！
re: ! It's disappearing!

eng: Crono! Look!!
jap: クロ！　あれ見ろ！！
re: Cro! Look that!

eng: M, Melchior?!
jap: ボ、ボッシュ！？
re: B, Bosch!?

eng: Melchior?!
jap: ボ、ボッシュ！？
re: B, Bosch!?

eng: Mr. Melchior?
jap: ボ、ボッシュさん？
re: B, Bosch-san?

eng: Old man Melchior!?
jap: ボッシュのじいさん……！
re: Old man Bosch......!

eng: Melchior?
jap: ボッシュのジジイ？
re: Old guy Bosch?

eng: Indeed, I am Melchior. Have we...met before? More importantly, can you tell me anything about the Ocean Palace?
jap: いかにも、ワシは ボッシュじゃが……。 お前さん達に会うのは、初めてじゃぞ？ それより女王は、海底神殿の計画は どうなった？ お前さん達、何か知らぬか？
re: Indeed, I am Bosch...... But that's odd, how do you know my name? More importantly, what has become of the Queen, the Ocean Floor Temple project? Do you know anything?

eng: I see...the Queen has degenerated to that degree...
jap: むう、そうか…… 女王の心は、すでにそこまで……
re: Mmh, I see...... The Queen's heart, already so far......

eng: The more energy the Mammon Machine absorbs, the further the Queen degenerates. Her spirit has been stolen by the infamous immortal, Lavos.
jap: 魔神器が吸い上げる エネルギーが大きくなればなるほど 女王は正気を失っていった……。 海底に眠る不死の神ラヴォスに 女王は人としての心を 食われてしまったのじゃ……。
re: The greater the energy that the Demonic Vessel sucks up grows, the more the Queen loses her sanity...... The Queen's heart as a human has been eaten by the immortal god Lavos that sleeps in the ocean floor......

eng: We must flee! The seal has been broken! The mountain will collapse!
jap: む！　ここの封印を解いたため 山が落ちるぞ！　急いで下りるのじゃ！
re: Mh! Because you broke the seal here, the mountain will fall! Descend quickly!

eng: Elder! The Mountain of Woe is about to crumble!!
jap: 長老！　な、なげきの山が！！
re: Elder! G, Grief Mountain!!

eng: Mommy, the mountain's gonna fall!
jap: ママ、お山が落ちてくるです～！
re: Mama, the mountain's falling down!

eng: Lavos sleeps deep underground, while consuming the energy of this planet. If the Mammon Machine is brought closer to him, he may awaken!
jap: ラヴォスは海底で、この星を 食べながら眠っておるのじゃ。 ラヴォスそのものを、目ざめさせて しまうかも知れぬ……！
re: Lavos is consuming this planet as it sleeps in the ocean floor. the ocean floor, I fear that Lavos itself might be awakened......!

eng: We must hurry before it's too late!
jap: 手おくれにならぬうちに なんとかせねば、大変な事になるぞ……
re: If we don't do something before it's too late, terrible things will happen......

eng: Elder! Schala is here!
jap: 長老！　サラ様がおいでです！
re: Elder! Sara-sama has come!

eng: What? Schala's here?
jap: 何、サラが？
re: What, Sara?

eng: Why don't we keep it right there...
jap: 「そこまでにしていただきましょうか。
re: 'Let's have you leave it at that, shall we?

eng: What a filthy hovel.
jap: ……きたない所。
re: ......filthy place.

eng: Miss Schala...why have you come to such a miserable place?
jap: サラ様……、このような所へ なぜ……。
re: Sara-sama...... to such a place as this, why......

eng: Stop degrading yourselves! We Enlightened Ones were once the same as you. The only difference is that we are under Lavos's control...
jap: やめて下さい……。 我ら光の民も、もとはあなた達と同じ。 私達は、ラヴォスの力におどらされて
re: Please stop...... We People of the Light too were once the same as you. The difference is nothing more than that we

eng: Melchior... After the Mountain of Woe fell, I thought I would find you here!
jap: ボッシュ…… なげきの山が落ちたので、ここに来れば あなたに会えると思ったのです。
re: Bosch...... Because Grief Mountain fell, I thought that I could meet you if I came here.

eng: Is it safe for you to leave the palace?
jap: 宮殿を出たりして だいじょうぶなのか？
re: Is it all right for you to do such a thing as leaving the palace?

eng: That no longer matters! The Ocean Palace is now operational!
jap: それどころではありません。 海底神殿が完成してしまったのです！
re: This no time to worry about that. I'm afraid the Ocean Floor Palace is complete!

eng: Then all is lost!
jap: 間に合わなかったか！
re: I wasn't in time?!

eng: But without me, the Mammon Machine won't work. I have turned my back on that evil device!
jap: しかし、私がいなければ魔神器は 動きません……。 私はもうこれ以上、魔神器を……。
re: However, the Demonic Vessel will not work if I am not there...... The Demonic Vessel, I will no longer......

eng: I've kept the Skyway open. Hurry! You must stop...my mother!
jap: 天への道を開いておきました。 はやく女王を…… 母を止めて下さい！
re: I have opened the Sky Road. Quickly, the Queen...... Please stop my mother!

eng: Dalton!
jap: ダ、ダルトン！
re: D, Dalton!

eng: Tisk, tisk my dear. Your presence is required elsewhere!
jap: 動かしてもらわなくっちゃあ 困るんですよ。ねえ……サラ様。
re: If we don't get you to run it, that's a problem. Isn't it...... Sara-sama.

eng: Dalton! Leave her alone!
jap: ダルトン！ お主のすきにはさせぬぞ！
re: Dalton! I won't let you do as you please!

eng: Ah! The geezer speaks!
jap: ジジイは説教くさくて たまらんね。
re: Old man, I can't stand how you reek of preaching.

eng: Silence, old man!
jap: だまっちまいな！
re: Silence!

eng: Argh!
jap: ぐはっ！
re: gwah!

eng: You'll come to the Ocean Palace with me. Do anything funny, and Schala's dust. Got it?
jap: さ、いっしょに海底神殿へ おりてもらいますよ。 邪魔するとサラ様の命は……。
re: Now, I'm having you come down to the Ocean Floor Palace with me. Interfere, and Sara-sama's life......

eng: Schala!
jap: 姉上！
re: Ane-ue!

eng: The Queen's children all seem to have a problem with authority, don't they?
jap: ったく、女王の血をひくガキは どいつもこいつも気が強くて いけない。
re: Oh come on, it's no good that every damn one of the brats with the Queen's blood is stubborn.

eng: Stay back. The life of this woman means nothing to me!
jap: おーっと、お前達も手を出すな。 俺は女王など少しも恐れちゃいない。 こんな小娘のクビなぞ、いつでも ハネてやるぞ！
re: Whoa, don't you guys interfere either. I'm not one bit scared of the Queen or anyone. I'm ready to take the head of a little girlie like this one any time!

eng: Shall we get going, Schala, dear? Your mother awaits!
jap: さーて、行きましょうかサラ様。 優しいお母上がお待ちかねですよ。
re: Now then, let us go, Sara-sama. Your gentle mother eagerly awaits you.

eng: Melchior!
jap: ボッシュ！
re: Bosch!

eng: Melchior!
jap: ボッシュ！
re: Bosch!

eng: Mr. Melchior!
jap: ボッシュサン！
re: Bosch-san!

eng: Melchior!
jap: じ、じーさん！
re: O, old man!

eng: Old man. Okay?!
jap: ジジイ　だいじょぶか！？
re: Old guy okay!?

eng: I'm all right.
jap: だいじょうぶじゃ……。
re: I'm all right......

eng: But we must save Schala, or else...
jap: 何としても、サラを 救い出さねば、大変な事に……。
re: If we don't somehow rescue Sara, terrible things......

eng: Impossible! Even though it's coming from YOU, Melchior...
jap: ムチャです！ いかにボッシュ様といえど……。
re: That's unreasonable! Even for you, Bosch-sama......

eng: If the Queen is allowed to fulfill her scheme, all life as we know it, is doomed!
jap: だが、この計画が実行されれば すべての人間、いや、すべての生命が 危機にさらされる……！
re: But, if this plan is carried out, all humans, no, all life will be exposed to a crisis......!

eng: You're willing to challenge the Queen?
jap: お、お主達が…… 行ってくれると言うのか……？
re: Y, you guys...... You mean you'll go for me......?

eng: You've done so much for us... ...and I don't even know your names!
jap: すまぬ……、名も知らぬ お前さん達に何から何まで……。
re: Thanks...... To you whose names I don't even know, everything......

eng: You'll find out soon enough!
jap: 名前なら、そのうち知る事に なるわよ！
re: If it's our names you want, you'll find out eventually!

eng: That's OK. Someday, maybe we'll need your help!
jap: いいのよ！　そのうち 私達が世話になるんだから！
re: It's okay! Since we're going to owe you one eventually!

eng: You've already helped us. Let us return the favor.
jap: イイエ、ワタシ達も世話になり マシタ。ギブ・アンド・テイクデス。
re: NO, WE are also indebtED to you. This is GIVE AND TAKE.

eng: Worry not thine head. Thou hath fixed the Masamune!
jap: 気にするな。 じいさんには、グランドリオンを 修復してもらった、かりがあるからな。
re: Don't worry about it. Since we owe you one for having you repair the Grandleon.

eng: Gramps use red stone. Help Crono. Now, Ayla help you.
jap: ジジイ、赤い石使って クロ達　助けた。 今度　エイラの番。
re: Old guy, used red stone, helped Cros. This time Ayla's turn.

eng: What ARE you talking about?
jap: な、何？
re: Wh, what?

eng: Crono! Let's get going!
jap: さ、急がなきゃ、クロノ！
re: C'mon, we've gotta hurry, Crono!

eng: Come on, Crono!
jap: 行くわよ、クロノ！
re: We're going, Crono!

eng: Crono, let us hurry!
jap: クロノ、急ぎマショウ！
re: Crono, LET US hurry!

eng: Crono, let us be on our way!
jap: クロノ、行くぞ！
re: Crono, we're going!

eng: Crono! We go now.
jap: さ　行く　クロ！！
re: Now we go, Cro!!

eng: Wait, take this with you.
jap: まて、これを持って行け……。
re: Wait, take this with you......

eng: It's made from the same red stone as the Mammon Machine. With it, you can destroy the Machine! What Lies Beyond?
jap: こいつは魔神器と同じ赤き石の かけらで、作られた物じゃ。 これなら、魔神器をこわせる……。 天空で待つものは
re: This was made from the same fragments of red stone as the Demonic Vessel. With this, you can break the Demonic Vessel...... That Which Awaits in the Sky
RetranslatorComment: もの in kana is ambiguous between 物 (thing)  and 者 (person).

eng: Schala's been abducted. But without sorcery, we can't do a thing.
jap: サラ様がさらわれてしまった……。 魔力を持たぬ我らでは どうする事も出来ん……。
re: Sara-sama has been abducted...... There is nothing we can do, not having magical powers......

eng: So it was the Enlightened Ones!
jap: やっぱり、光の民は……。
re: So the People of the Light really are......

eng: Miss Schala, where have you gone?
jap: サラ様、どこへいっちゃったですか？
re: Sara-sama, where'd you go?

eng: Aaaahhh, Schala...Schala...!!
jap: え～ん、サラ様が……　サラ様がァ～！！
re: Waaah, Sara-sama was...... Sara-samaaa!!

eng: How could something like this happen?
jap: それなのに…… なぜ、こんな事に……。
re: Even so...... Why did such a thing......?

eng: Use the Skyway to chase Dalton. And please hurry, for Schala's sake!
jap: 天の道を使えば、ダルトンを追えるはず。 はやく、サラ様を……。
re: If you use the Sky Road, you should be able to chase Dalton. Quickly, Sara-sama......

eng: It's likely that Dalton came here using the Skyway that Schala created.
jap: おそらくダルトンは サラ様の開いた天の道を通って この村に来たのでしょう。
re: Dalton probably came to this village through the Sky Road when Sara-sama opened it.
RetranslatorComment: Opened, not created.

eng: Sir Janus is headed toward the Skyway to save Miss Schala!
jap: ジャキ様は、サラ様を助けるため 天の道へと向かわれました。
re: Jyaki-sama headed for the Sky Road to save Sara-sama.

eng: The Gurus of Time and Reason are missing, along with Miss Schala. Can no one stop the Queen?
jap: 理の賢者様や時の賢者様は行方が知れず サラ様までもがとらわれてしまいました。 ……、女王の計画を止める事は もう不可能なのでしょうか？
re: No one knows where the Philosophers of Reason and Time are, and even Sara-sama has been seized. ......it's impossible to stop the Queen's plans any more, isn't it?

eng: Is Miss Schala alive?
jap: ……サラ様は、ご無事でしょうか？
re: ......is Sara-sama okay?

eng: The Palace is finished! This heralds the dawn of the eternal kingdom of Zeal!! [Zeal Palace, 12000 B.C.]
jap: 海底神殿が完成しました。 おお、われらジールの永遠の時が はじまる！！
re: The Ocean Floor Temple is completed. Oh, the eternal time of we of Zeal begins!!

eng: The Queen took Schala with her to the Ocean Palace. We Enlightened Ones will finally attain immortality.
jap: 女王様はサラ様をともなって 海底神殿におりられました。 ついにわれら光の民が 永遠の生命を手にするのです。
re: The Queen took Sara-sama with her and descended to the Ocean Floor Temple. Finally, we People of the Light will obtain eternal life.

eng: The way to the Ocean Palace is through the Queen's hall. A day will come when all may see the shining new Mammon Machine.
jap: 海底神殿への入り口は 女王の間にあるらしい。 いずれ誰もが光り輝く新しい魔神器を 見られるようになるよ。
re: I've heard that the entrance to the Ocean Floor Temple is in the Queen's hall. One day all will be able to see the radiant new Demonic Vessel.

eng: The Ocean Palace is complete. Zeal will rule forever!!
jap: 海底神殿が完成しました。 おお、われらジールの永遠の時が はじまる！！
re: The Ocean Floor Temple has been completed. Oh, the eternal time of we of Zeal begins!!

eng: Our kingdom is shrouded in eternal light. There is no sadness or fear, only eternal peace.
jap: わがジール王国は永遠の光に つつまれる……。 もうそこには、おそれも悲しみもない。 ただ終わることのない安らぎだけが 待っているのだ。
re: Our Zeal Kingdom is enveloped in eternal light...... Here, no longer is there either fear or sorrow. Just endless tranquility awaits us.

eng: The hall of the Mammon Machine is beyond. But the power is gone...
jap: この先は魔神器の間じゃが もはや、あの気のみなぎりは 感じられぬわい……。
re: Beyond here is the hall of the Demonic Vessel, but I can't feel that brimming spirit any more......

eng: Just as I thought! Unfortunately, the Mammon Machine has been moved. Tragic...I can no longer feel the last waves of energy.
jap: やっぱり！ でも、おあいにく様。 魔神器はもうここにはありませんわ。 うるうる……。 ああ……、でも私にも もう感じられないのですわ。 あのファイナル・うるうるが……！
re: I knew it! But it's most unfortunate. The Demonic Vessel is no longer here. My eyes are clouding...... Aah..... but I can no longer feel it. That ultimate eye-clouder......!

eng: The Mammon Machine was moved to the Ocean Palace to obtain the raw energy of Lavos.
jap: 魔神器は海底神殿にうつされたよ。 ついに、まことのラヴォス・エネルギーを 手に入れる時がきたのじゃ。
re: The Demonic Vessel was transferred to the Ocean Floor Temple. Finally, the time has come when we will

eng: Phooey! Why is the Prophet allowed inside while I'm stuck with guard duty?
jap: ったく、あの予言者のヤローが 中に入れて、なぜこの俺様が こんなところで見はり……
re: Jeez, that prophet bastard went in, how come I'M lookout in a place like this......?

eng: Ha! There you are...
jap: ハン、来やがったな……。
re: Hmph, you bastards came......

eng: I let the Prophet go, knowing he'd mess up sooner or later. But I've no use for you anymore.
jap: 予言者のヤツが なにかボロを出すかと思って およがせていたが……。 もう、お前らも用ずみだな。
re: I let that prophet bastard go, thinking he'll slip up somehow...... But I've no further use for you guys either.

eng: You're history!
jap: いさぎよく死ねーいッ！
re: Take it like a man and dieee!

eng: N...nooooo! I'm going to be immortal! I CAN'T be beaten now!
jap: バ、バカな……！ 俺は永遠の力を手に入れるんだ。 こんな所でやられてたまるか！
re: N, no way......! I'm going to get the power of eternity. As if I'd just lie down and get beaten now!

eng: Lavos Beckons
jap: ラヴォスの呼び声
re: The Call of Lavos

eng: The black energy grows... Something scary is waking up!
jap: 黒い気が、たかまってくる……。 こわいものが目をさましちゃうよ。
re: A black spirit is swelling...... Something scary is waking up.

eng: Schala, raise the power of the Mammon Machine to its limit!
jap: さあ、サラよ、魔神器のパワーを 限界まで上げるのだ。
re: Now, Sara, raise the Demonic Vessel's power up to the limit.

eng: Schala! You dare to disobey me?!
jap: サラ！ わらわの言う事が聞けぬのか！？
re: Sara! You won't obey what I say!?

eng: All right, mother...
jap: わかりました、母上……。
re: Understood, mother......

eng: Oh...what bright splendor! The incredible power of Lavos!!!
jap: おお……、なんとまばゆい輝き！ すばらしきラヴォス様の力よ！！
re: Ohhh.... such a dazzling radiance! Lavos-sama's magnificent power!!

eng: Aagh...
jap: うッ……。

eng: The ancient Red Rock has been passed down through the ages. From it, a magic pendant and a knife were made. We embody Melchior's dreams, sealed, within the knife...
jap: 大昔から伝わる赤い石……。 その石からペンダントが、魔神器が 作られ…… そしてナイフがつくられた。 ボクらはナイフにこめられた、 ボッシュの希望なんだよ……。
re: The red stone handed down from long ago...... From that stone, a pendant and the Demonic Vessel were made...... And a knife was made. We are Bosch's hopes, imbued into the knife......

eng: Now hurry, if you plan to confront the Queen. We're counting on you!
jap: さあ、女王たちの所に 行くつもりなら、急がないと……。 たのむぜ、兄ちゃん達。
re: Now, if you plan on going where the queen and the others are, you must hurry...... We're counting on you guys.

eng: Ahh, I can feel it! The pulse of eternal life!!! Ha, ha, ha...!
jap: ああ、感じる……、感じるぞ！ 永遠の生命のこどうを……！！ ククク……！
re: Ahhh, I feel it...... I feel it! The pulse of eternal life......!! Ku, ku, ku......!

eng: D...dark...force...wild energy...! Aughhh!
jap: こ、この黒い気のうずは……！？ う……ッ！
re: Th, this swirl of black spirit......!? ugh......!

eng: Th, the Mammon Machine! Your majesty, it's too dangerous!
jap: ま、魔神器のようすが……！！ 女王様、これ以上は危険です！
re: Th, the Demonic Vessel looks......!! Queen, any more than this is dangerous!

eng: Mother...!
re: Mother......!!

eng: Don't stop Schala! We're almost there... Immortality will be ours! Zeal will have the glory it deserves!
jap: 続けるのだ、サラ！ あともう少しだ……。 わらわは永遠の生命を手に入れる！ わがジール王国は神の光に つつまれるのだ！
re: Continue, Sara! Just a little more...... I will obtain eternal life! Our Zeal Kingdom will be engulfed in the light of the gods!

eng: Mwa, ha, ha... Too long have I waited...!
jap: ククク……。 アーッハッハッハッ……！！
re: Ku, ku, ku...... Ah, ha, ha, ha......!!

eng: You made it THIS far. Maybe I underestimated you...
jap: ほんとに、こんなとこまで 来やがったのか。 どうやらお前らの力を 見くびっていたようだな……。
re: So you really went and came all the way to a place like this. It seems as though I've underestimated your power......

eng: But this is the end! THEY will take care of you!
jap: だが、それもここまでだな。 お前らのしまつは コイツらがつけてくれるわ！
re: But that ends here too. They'll take care of dealing with you!

eng: Come, GolemTwins!
jap: いでよ！ ゴーレム・シスターズ！！
re: Come forth! Golem Sisters!!

eng: They beat the GolemTwins!? All right, this calls for the GolemBoss.
jap: ちッ！　シスターズを……！ こうなりゃマスター・ゴーレムで……
re: Damn! The Sisters......! If it's come to this, with the Master Golem......

eng: W, what's this strange force? Could this be...Lavos's energy?!
jap: な、何だ…… このブキミな気の高まりは？ こ、こいつがホントの ラヴォス・エネルギーかよ……！？
re: Wh, what's this......? This eerie swelling of spirit? Is, is this, the true Lavos energy......!?

eng: ... I've got a bad feeling about this... All my work will be in vain if I expire before I'm immortal!
jap: ………。 なんだかこりゃ、ヤバいことに なりそうな気がするな……。 永遠の命を手に入れたにしても その時もう死んじまってたんじゃ 元も子もないからな！
re: ......... I've kind of got the feeling this's gonna turn into something dangerous.... Even if we gain eternal life, if I'm already dead by then, I'm not gonna get a thing out of it!

eng: This is your lucky day! Bye-bye!
jap: よし、今日のところは 見のがしてやる！ あばよッ！
re: All right, I'll do you a favor and overlook this for today! Later!

eng: This is the hall of the Mammon Machine... Now is the time to turn back, nu...
jap: ここ魔神器のさいだん…… 引き返すなら今のうち、ヌウ……。
re: This is the Demonic Vessel's shrine...... If you're turning back, now's the time, nuu......

eng: Schala! We're here to save you, c'mon!!
jap: サラ！　助けに来たよ！ こんなとこ逃げ出しちゃおう！
re: Sara! We've come to save you! Let's get outta here!

eng: We just made it in time! It's a pity, but I'll have to turn this machine off!
jap: どうやら間に合った ちょっとおしい気もするけど そのマシン、止めさせてもらうわよ！
re: It looks like we've made it in time! It's kind of a shame, but we're going to have you stop that machine!

eng: A gravitational pull!? I sense a dimensional warp!
jap: ものすごい重力ウエーブ！？ 次元のゆらぎが感じられマス！
re: Staggering gravity waves!? I CAN feel a dimensional fluctuation!

eng: We shan't allow thee to meddle with Lavos, Queen!
jap: もうこれ以上、ラヴォスに ちょっかいは出させんぞ、女王！
re: We won't let you meddle with Lavos any further, Queen!

eng: Ayla come! Where strong beast?!
jap: エイラ　来たぞ！ 強いヤツ　どこ　いる！？
re: Ayla came! Where strong guy!?

eng: You're...!
jap: あなた方は……！
re: You people are......!

eng: Help!!
jap: キャアッ！！
re: Kyaah!!

eng: Schala...!
jap: サラ！
re: Sara!

eng: What are you doing Schala?! I need your help here!
jap: 何をやっている、サラ！ ちゃんとコントロールせぬか！
re: What are you doing, Sara! Can't I get you to do your job and control it?!

eng: Crono...! The Red Knife!
jap: クロノ……！ 赤いナイフを！
re: Crono......! The red knife!

eng: Quickly Crono! There's no time!
jap: さあ、クロノ！ いそがないと、マズイわよ……！
re: Come on, Crono! If you don't hurry, this is gonna suck......!

eng: Use the knife from Melchior to stop the Mammon Machine.
jap: ボッシュさんから あずかったナイフで 魔神器をテイシさせなくテハ……！
re: We MUST make the Demonic Vessel HALT with the knife we took charge of from Bosch-san......!

eng: Crono, use the old man's knife to stop the Machine!
jap: じーさんのナイフだ クロノ！ 魔神器をとめろ！！
re: The old man's knife, Crono! Stop the Demonic Vessel!!

eng: Crono! Use Red Knife!!
jap: クロッ！ ナイフ　赤いの！！
re: Cro! Knife, red one!!

eng: Here we go Mune!
jap: よし、行くぞリオン！
re: All right, here we go, Leon!

eng: Ready, big brother!
jap: うん、グラン兄ちゃん！
re: Yeah, Gran nii-chan!

eng: T, 'tis... ...the Masamune?!
jap: あ、あれは…… グランドリオン！？
re: Th, that's...... The Grandleon!?

eng: The Machine's energy changed the knife into a sword?
jap: 魔神器のエネルギーで ナイフが剣に……！？
re: The knife turned into a sword with the Demonic Vessel's energy......!?

eng: Whoa...! It turned into the Masamune!?
jap: あ、あれ……？ グランドリオンになっちゃったよ！？
re: H, huh......? It turned into the Grandleon!?

eng: The knife used the Machine's power to become a sword?
jap: 魔神器のパワーを キュウシュウして ナイフが剣になったのデスカ！？
re: The knife ABSORBed the Demonic Vessel's power and became a sword!?

As I'm rechecking the  script I'm noticing just how obviously hung-up on Cyrus's death Frog is in  the JP version. It doesn't come across so clearly in the NA.

re: I, who have lost even the power of magic...... In an earth like this...... Can I go on living?

eng: You don't need magic to survive. Besides, you're not alone!
jap: 魔法なんて生きていくには必要ないさ。 それに、あんた一人じゃないんだぜ。
re: You don't need magic or anything like that to go on living. Besides, you're not alone.

eng: You're absolutely right! We're alive, and there's always hope.
jap: そうですね。 それに私は生きているのですから。 生きることをあきらめなければ きっと……。
re: You're right. Besides, I'm alive. If I don't give up on living, then surely......

eng: Gotta seize the day!
jap: 明日は明日の風がふくってね……。 そう信じていきましょうや。
re: Like they say, tomorrow's wind will blow tomorrow...... Let's go on believing that.

eng: Everything and everyone sank to the bottom.
jap: みんな、しずんじまった…。
re: Everything sank......
RetranslatorComment: Could also mean everyone's depressed

eng: The sea of clouds has parted and the blizzard has finally abated. Could the long winter finally be over?

re: The sea of clouds that covered the heavens has gone, and the blizzard has stopped...... I wonder if the long...... very long winter has ended.

eng: Zzz...
jap: スースー
re: zzz zzz
RetranslatorComment: the sound is of blowing wind or light nasal breathing.

eng: Must have cried himself to sleep. Let him be.
jap: 泣きつかれたのでしょう……。 ねかしておいてください。
re: He's probably worn himself out with crying...... Please let him sleep.

eng: All rested up?
jap: お前さん達、体はもう だいじょうぶなのかい。
re: Is your health all right now?

eng: Bow, and pay homage to our new liege, King Dalton!
jap: え～い、頭が高い！ 新王ダルトン様のおな～り～！
re: Hey, bow down! The new king Dalton-sama arrives!
RetranslatorComment: Literally “your heads are high”, meaning they aren't bowing enough to properly show respect. ...this one took me a while to figure out....

eng: You there! What's wrong?! You're lucky to be alive!
jap: 何だ何だ！　おめえら！ せっかく生き残ったってーのに そのシケたツラは！
re: What's your problem, you guys! Those stormy faces, even though I went to all that trouble to survive!

eng: The old crone and the pesky Gurus are gone. I now rename Zeal, the Kingdom of Dalton!

re: Hm? Y, you guys! So, you just HAD had to be all stubborn and survive too!? So then, the vehicle outside is yours? Looks just like the thing Gasch was designing before......

'ki wo okosu' isn't in  the dictionary, and the only Google hit was for a similar line in negative  command form, given as meaning “don't try anything funny”

eng: Ever since Lavos's time portal stranded me in the Middle Ages... I have waited to even the score. You interrupted me just when I had summoned Lavos to my castle. How ironic that, having been drawn into yet another portal, I would end up in this age. Being from the future, my knowledge of the past enabled me to convince the Queen that I was a mighty oracle. But no history book could have prepared me for what happened here. Unimaginable is the power of Lavos. Anyone who dares to oppose...it...meets certain doom. At this rate, you too, will meet a hideous fate. Just like that poor fool, Crono!
jap: 私はヤツを倒すことだけ 考え生きてきた……。 ヤツが作りだしたうずに飮み込まれ 中世に落ちて以来な……。 わが城でラヴォスを呼びだす事を お前達にジャマされ…… ふたたび次元のうずに飮み込まれ たどりついた先がこの時代とはな……。 ヒニクなものだ……。 歴史を知る私は、予言者として女王に 近づきラヴォスとの対決を待った……。 しかし結果は……。 ……。 ラヴォスの力は強大だ。 ヤツの前では、全ての者に 黒き死の風がふきすさぶ……。 このままではお前達も同じ運命だぞ。 あのクロノとかいうヤツとな！
re: I went on living, thinking only of beating IT...... I was swallowed in the swirl IT made, fell into the Middle Ages, and since then...… I had you get in the way of my summoning Lavos at my castle...... Who'd have guessed that, swallowed yet again in a dimensional swirl, it was this era I would reach...... It's ironic...... Knowing history, I approached the queen as a a prophet and waited to confront Lavos...... But the results...... ...... Lavos's power is tremendous. Before IT, the black wind of death blows fiercely against all...... At this rate, you too will have the same fate. The same as that Crono person!
