jap: けど、こんなんで、こいつが 終わりとは思えない……！
re: But it doesn't seem like it'd be done for just with something like this......!

eng: I wish it were over...
jap: コ、コレで終わってくれると うれしいんだけど……
re: I, I'd be glad if it was over with this, but......

eng: I sense a powerful life force within Lavos.
jap: ラヴォスの体内からは さらに強力な生命エネルギーが感知 されマス……！
re: From inside Lavos's body, a still more powerful life energy IS detected......!

eng: Will there never be an end...?
jap: だが、これで終わりとは 思えんがな……。
re: But it doesn't seem like it's over with just this......

eng: This Lavos's shell! Inside still strong!!
jap: これ　ラヴォスのカラ！ なかみ　まだ　元気！！
re: This Lavos's shell! Insides still healthy!!

eng: It ain't over yet...
jap: うかれるな！ 安心するのはまだ早い……！
re: Don't celebrate! It's still too early to be relieved......!

eng: L...let's go inside!
jap: な、中に入ってみよう！
re: L, let's try going inside!

eng: I guess we have no choice. But...
jap: 中に入るしかないのね。 やっぱり……
re: There's no choice but to go inside. I knew it......

eng: We must invade the interior and attack its...core!
jap: 体内にシンニュウし シンゾウ部を倒さねば！
re: We must INVADE the insides and defeat the CORE part!

eng: This be only armor! 'Tis what's inside that must be destroyed!
jap: しょせん、こいつはヨロイ。 なかみをブッ倒さなきゃな……！
re: It turns out this one's armor. Got to beat the insides to death......!

eng: Ayla no give up!!
jap: エイラ　負けない！！
re: Ayla not lose!!

eng: We'll get to the bottom of this, Lavos... [Lavos Battle, 1999 A.D. (With Epoch)]
jap: いきのねを止めてやるぞ。 ラヴォス……！
re: I'll put an end to your life. Lavos......!

eng: Eeeeeek!
jap: キャアッ！
re: Kyaah!

eng: We're all right, aren't we?!
jap: だ、だいじょぶでしょうね！？
re: E, everything's okay, right!?

eng: Unbelievable energy! As if the sum total of all the human spiritual power that has ever existed were somehow being amplified...
jap: 見たこともないエネルギー！ まるで人間の精神力を、おそろしく ぞうふくしたような……！！
re: Energy such as I have never seen! Just as though it has amplified the power of the human spirit to a terrifying extent......!!

eng: What's happening?!
jap: なななな、何だってんだ！？
re: Whwhwhwh, what's going on!?

eng: Epoch alive?
jap: シルバード　こいつ 生きてるか！？
re: Sylbird, it alive!?

eng: We'll break our way through.
jap: このまま、ヤツの中まで 突っ込んでやる……。
re: We'll keep on like this and pierce into IT......

eng: Okay, carry on! Epoch!!
jap: よし　このまま行け！ シルバード！！
re: Okay, keep go like this! Sylbird!!

eng: This battle leadeth nowhere. We must use the Epoch to break through!
jap: このままヤツと戦っても ラチがあかねえ！ このままシルバードで奥まで つっこんでみるってなどーだ……？
re: It won't get us anywhere even if we keep fighting it like this! How about we keep on like this and pierce into its depths with the Sylbird......?

eng: Let's just burst through Lavos with the Epoch!
jap: このままシルバードで ラヴォスの中までつっこんじゃおうよ！
re: Let's keep on like this and plunge into Lavos with the Sylbird!!

eng: This will have no effect on Lavos. How about invading the interior with the Epoch?
jap: このまま戦っていても ラヴォスには、ダメージがアリマセン。 このシルバードで、奥まで行って 本体をたたいてみては、どうデショウ？
re: Even if we keep fighting like this, there WILL BE NO damage to Lavos. How WOULD trying to go to the depths with this Sylbird and striking the main body BE?

eng: Think we can burst through Lavos with the Epoch?
jap: ……シルバードでラヴォスの 外がわを突き破って、中まで 行けないかしら？
re: ......I wonder if we couldn't break through Lavos's outer shell with the Sylbird and go inside?

eng: We might wreck the Epoch! But...we really don't have a choice...
jap: シルバードを こわしちゃうかも知れないわよ！ だいいち、中にいる私達がもつかどうか ……
re: It might break the Sylbird! And as for whether or not we'll make it in the first place, being inside it......
RetranslatorComment: She's echoing Robo's  concern, below, that they won't survive the impact.

eng: The Epoch's strong enough to penetrate Lavos's armor...but we may not be strong enough to survive the shock...
jap: ラヴォスの外かくと シルバードの強度は、ほぼ同等デスガ ワタシ達が突入のショックに たえられるかドウカ……
re: Lavos's outer shell and the Sylbird's strength ARE roughly equal, BUT WHETHER WE will be able to withstand the shock of entry OR NOT......

eng: What?! That means we'll ALL perish...
jap: えー！？ そんな事したら、シルバードも 私達も……。
re: Whaaat!? If we do that, the Sylbird, and us too......

eng: If we err, we're done for...
jap: ヘタすりゃ、俺達もおだぶつ だぜ……。
re: We'll be doing ourselves in if anything goes wrong......

eng: It  Okay?! Epoch not die!
jap: だいじょぶか！？ シルバード　死なないか！？
re: It okay!? Sylbird not die!?

eng: You really think this is going to work?
jap: もつほしょうがあるのか……？
re: Any guarantee it's going to hold......?

eng: This is a losing proposition...
jap: まともに戦っていても 勝ち目はない……。
re: There's no chance of winning if we fight fair, either......
RetranslatorComment: See, Magus doesn't give up that easily.

eng: Let's put our trust in the Epoch!
jap: シルバードを信じようよ！
re: Let's believe in the Sylbird!

eng: The Epoch'll get us through...
jap: シルバードなら…… やってくれるはず……！
re: If it's the Sylbird...... It ought to do it for us......!

eng: The odds are not good... energy and our own vitality are combined...
jap: かくりつは、きわめて ひくいデスガ……。 シルバードのエネルギーとワタシ達の 精神エネルギーが一体となれば あるいは……
re: The probability IS exceedingly low...... BUT perhaps if the Sylbird's energy and OUR spiritual energy became one......
RetranslatorComment: Now that's an interesting line. Robo uses the same  'spirit' term to describe the energy when the vehicle time warps, the energy  that the Black Dream/Omen gives off, and the Grandleon/Masamune.

eng: We haveth no choice! We must break through...!
jap: あのバケモンを倒すには 中からたたくしかないだろう……！
re: I doubt there's any way to beat that monster but to hit it from the inside......!

eng: Epoch win! Ayla win!
jap: シルバード　負けない！ エイラも負けない！
re: Sylbird not lose! Ayla not lose either!

eng: Very well...
jap: よかろう……。
re: Very well......

eng: Countin' on ya, Epoch!
jap: たのむよ、シルバード！
re: We're counting on you, Sylbird!

eng: Sorry, Epoch...
jap: ゴメンね、シルバード……
re: Sorry, Sylbird......

eng: We're fresh out of options.
jap: たしかに他に成功する かくりつもありマセンネ。
re: Certainly there ARE no other probabilities for succeeding either.

eng: It's either one or the other...
jap: いちかばちか……だな。
re: All or nothing......I guess.

eng: All right! Ayla try! Epoch try hard too!!
jap: よーし！ エイラ　がんばる！ シルバードも　がんばれ！！
re: Okay! Ayla try hard! Sylbird try hard too!!

eng: Everyone, hold on!
jap: みんな、しっかりつかまって！
re: Everyone, hold on tight!

eng: We believe in you, Epoch!
jap: 信じてるからね…… シルバード！
re: We believe in you...... Sylbird!!

eng: Everyone, get ready for the initial impact!
jap: ミナサン、突入時のショックに 備えてクダサイ！
re: EVERYONE, PLEASE prepare for the shock of entry!

eng: Cyrus! Please protect us...
jap: 俺達を守ってくれ…… サイラス！
re: Protect us...... Cyrus!

eng: Ayla not give up! Epoch not give up too!!
jap: エイラ　負けない！ シルバードも　負けるな！！
re: Ayla not lose! Sylbird, you not lose either!!

eng: I'm waiting for you, Lavos.
jap: ……待っていろ、ラヴォス。
re: ......just you wait, Lavos.

eng: C'mon, everyone!
jap: 行くよ！　みんな！！
re: Here we go! Everyone!!

eng: Epoch, don't let us down!
jap: たのんだわよ、シルバード！
re: We're counting on you, Sylbird!

eng: The Epoch's moving!
jap: シルバード発進！
re: Sylbird moving out!

eng: Go forth, Epoch!
jap: ハイヨー！　シルバード！
re: Heigh-ho, Sylbird!

eng: Go! Epoch!!
jap: 行く！　シルバード！！
re: We go! Sylbird!!

eng: Here we come, Lavos!
jap: 今、行ってやるぞ…… ラヴォス！
re: I'm coming for you now...... Lavos!

eng: Hmmmmm...
jap: う、ううん……
re: uh, uhhn......

eng: Everyone OK?...
jap: み、みんな無事……？
re: Is, is everyone okay......?

eng: Owwww......
jap: イ、イテテテ……
re: Ow, ow ow ow......

eng: Ayla...alive...!
jap: エイラ　生きてる……！
re: Ayla alive......!

eng: You can open your eyes. We're inside!
jap: さっさと目をさませ。 ここは、ヤツの中だぞ……！
re: Hurry and wake up. This is inside IT......!

eng: We beat the odds...
jap: ……よく、ここまで たどりついたな。
re: ......good job making it this far.

eng: Epoch is...in pieces.
jap: シルバードは…… 大破してしまいマシタ。
re: The Sylbird...... WAS damaged severely.

eng: Thank you, Epoch...
jap: ありがとう、シルバード……
re: Thanks, Sylbird......

eng: I'm sorry, Epoch...
jap: ゴメンね、シルバード……
re: Sorry, Sylbird......

eng: Epoch... Me proud!
jap: シルバード…… お前　よく戦ったぞ！
re: Sylbird...... You fought well!

eng: ...No turning back now.
jap: ……もう後もどりは出来んぞ。
re: ......can't back out any more.

eng: We're in pretty deep...
jap: ずいぶん奥まで来ちゃった けど……
re: We've come awfully deep inside......

eng: We're okay...right?
jap: だ、だいじょぶでしょうね。
re: W, we're okay, right?

eng: According to my sensors, we are close to the center!
jap: センサーの反応によれば 中心は近いデス！
re: According to my sensor reactions, the core IS close!

eng: This is creepy. It's worse than Magus's place...
jap: うすッ気味悪いトコだぜ。 魔王城より悪しゅみだ……。
re: Creepy place. More disturbing than Magus Castle......

eng: !! Lavos smell...STRONGER!!
jap: ！！ ラヴォスのにおい　強くなる！！
re: !! Lavos's smell get stronger!!

eng: This...is...Lavos!
jap: こいつが……ラヴォス！
re: This......is Lavos!

eng: This's the REAL thing?!
jap: こ、これが……本体！？
re: Th, this......is its true form!?

eng: Amazing... It houses all the DNA of every creature that ever lived...!
jap: シ！　信じられマセン……！ この星に生命がたんじょうして以来の あらゆる生物の遺伝子を持っていマス！
re: I! I canNOT believe it......! It HAS the genes of all living creatures since its birth on this planet!

eng: Cyrus, this be our finest battle...
jap: ともに戦ってくれ…… サイラス！
re: Fight along with me...... Cyrus!

eng: Ayla not give up!!
jap: エイラ　負けない！！
re: Ayla not lose!!

eng: Finally... You have met your match, Lavos!...
jap: 今度こそ…… きさまのさいごだ、ラヴォス……！
re: This time, for certain...... It will be your last, Lavos......!

eng: It's...humanoid... It seems like it has collected all of the vitality from the creatures who have lived on this planet. (absent or absorbed into the above)
jap: に、人間の形…… こ、こいつ、もしかして…… この星の生き物ぜんぶの力を そなえてるんじゃ…… そうよ！　原始にふって来て以来ずっと 私達の下でこの星の生き物のすべてを 吸い取って……！！
re: H, human form...... It, it, don't tell me...... It couldn't be armed with the powers of every living thing on this planet......? That's it! Ever since it fell in Primeval times, it's been under us, absorbing all the living things on this planet the whole time......!!
RetranslatorComment: Looks like the NA version doesn't have this line.

eng: Now I understand... It lives on a planet for as long as possible, stealing away the most vital resources... It combined the DNA it found here with its own, and gave birth to those creatures up on Death Peak. Eventually the young must migrate to other planets...to repeat the cycle...
jap: わ、わかったわ。 こいつのねらいが…… 星に寄生して長い時間をかけて その星の生命体のすぐれた部分を よりすぐって、あつめる……。 その遺伝子を持った子供を あの死の山で生み、また別の星へ……
re: I, I've figured it out. Its aims...... It's parasitic on a planet, and picks out and collects the superior parts of the life forms on that planet over a long time...... It bears children with those genes on that Death Mountain, and then on to another planet......

eng: This was Lavos's goal...! Using the DNA of every organism... And achieving the ultimate in evolution!
jap: コ、コレがラヴォスの 目的だったのデス……！ 星のすべての生物の遺伝子、記録を えて…… 自分自身が進化をとげるのデス！
re: TH, THIS was Lavos's goal......! TO gain a record of the genes of every living creature on the planet...… And TO achieve evolution itself!

eng: This be evil! Indeed! This thing possesseth the vitality of all living creatures... It hath harvested DNA from animals, only to further its own evolution! And whilst sleeping, to boot!
jap: ど、どうなってやがる……！？ 待てよ、こいつこの星の生き物 すべての力を持ってるってんじゃあ…… そうか！　俺達、この星の生き物の 進化して来たすべてを…… こいつは眠りながら、たくわえて いやがったのか……！！
re: Wh, what the hell's going on......!? Hold on, don't tell me it's got the powers of every living thing on this planet...... That's it! Us, everything that's evolved in every living thing on this planet...... The bastard's been storing it all up while it sleeps......!!

eng: ...... So...since the dawn of time, it has slept underground, controlling evolution on this world for his own purpose...
jap: …… 太古の時代より、地下に眠り この星のすべての生命の進化を そのまま我がものにして来たのか……。
re: ....... It's slept underground and kept on making the the evolution of all life on this planet its own since ancient eras......?
RetranslatorComment: In the NA version, Magus noted that Lavos had been "controlling evolution for its own purposes." This makes it seem as if Lavos were actively guiding evolution. In fact, the only known instance of this is humanity's contact with the Frozen Flame. In the Japanese version, Magus merely says that Lavos has been "making the evolution of all life...its own," which is similar to the other party members' statements that Lavos is merely harvesting certain traits for his own evolution. It is far removed from the sweeping statement that Lavos controlled absolutely everything.

eng: This smell like Ayla's land! Reptites, Ptero, Nizbel. Ayla, and [member1]! Smell like all people I know!!... Smell of all living things!!
jap: こいつ　エイラ達！ 恐竜人　プテラン　ニズベール……！ エイラや　[pc1]　みんな！ みんなのにおい　する……！！ 大地の生命のにおい　全部 持ってる！！
re: This Aylas! Dinomen, Pteran, Nizbel......! Ayla, {char1}, all! Smells like all......! Has smells of all earth's life!!

eng: Attack value is... ...off the scale! It's shorting out my sensors!
jap: 戦闘能力値は…… ケ、計測不可能！ センサーがこわされそうデス！！
re: Combat ability value is...... C, cannot measure! My sensors feel NEAR to breaking!!

eng: Are you saying IT'S the reason we're all here?
jap: じゃあ私達はこいつのために 生きてきたっていうの！？
re: Then that means we've been living for its sake!?

eng: We were created only to be harvested. All people... ...and all living things...
jap: いわばラヴォスのエサに すぎなかったというわけだ。 我々人間、いや…… この星の生命すべてな……。
re: That means we were, so to speak, no more than Lavos's feed. We humans, no...... All life on this planet......

eng: Grown like farm animals, waiting to be slaughtered... All of our history... our art and science... All to meet the needs of that... beast...
jap: この星の生命が長い時間をかけ してきた進化を、ねむってるだけで しようなんてムシがよすぎるわよ……！
re: Making use of the evolution this planet's life took such a long time to go through just by sleeping, that's asking way too much......!

eng: It...is too much to bear... We have been reared like animals...! Our lives hath been for naught...
jap: じょうだんじゃねえ…… てめえのかてになるために、みんな 生きてるわけじゃねえ！
re: You've GOT to be kidding...... We're NOT all living so we can become your provisions, damn you!

eng: Me no run! Ayla no run away! Worse than losing!!
jap: 逃げない！ エイラ　逃げない！ 逃げる　負けるより　イヤ！！
re: Not run away! Ayla not run away! Run away worse than lose!!

eng: This is Crono's and ours... Leene's and Doan's...everyone's...!
jap: ここは、クロノや私達…… リーネやドンや……、みんなの……！
re: This is Crono's, our...... Leene's, Don's...... everyone's......!

eng: This is Crono's and our's... Everyone's...! ...and I mean, EVERYONE's world!!
jap: ここは、クロノや私達…… みんなの……！ みんなの星なんだからッ！！
re: This is Crono's, our...... everyone's......! Everyone's planet!!
RetranslatorComment: Said only in a New Game +. Interesting, eh?

eng: Impossible... You CAN'T expect to toy with an entire world and get away with it!
jap: そんな…… そんなふざけた進化なんて 私はみとめないからッ！
re: No way...... I won't stand for such a ridiculous evolution!

eng: Human hands created me... Which means I am a product of that thing...I am no different than Lucca and the others... I am a part of all living things!!
jap: ワタシは人間によって 作られた命…… シカシ命は命デス！ ルッカや、他のミナサンと同じ…… この星の多くの命の一つデスッ！！
re: I am a life created by humans...... HOWEVER, life IS life! Just like Lucca, and EVERYONE else...... I AM one of the many lives of this planet!!

eng: My life retain'eth its meaning...! We haveth our own will!!
jap: てめえなんぞのために……！ 俺達は生きちゃいないッ！！
re: For the sake of a bastard like you......! That's NOT why we're living!!

eng: Ayla strong! Ayla and world good! You outsider. Not part of planet's life!!
jap: エイラ　負けない！ エイラ達　この大地の命！ お前　この大地の命　ちがう！！
re: Ayla not lose! Aylas this earth's life! You not this earth's life!!

eng: ...... It's over for you... Your life ends here! Lavos enters attack mode! Lavos changes attack mode!
jap: …… 今度こそ、きさまを倒し…… わが長き闘いに決着をつけてやる……！ ラヴォスが攻撃モードに入る！ ラヴォスの攻撃モードが変化する！
re: ...... This time, I WILL beat you, you bastard...... I will settle my long struggle......! Lavos enters attack mode! Lavos's attack mode changes!

eng: Crono... Crono! Crono!!!
jap: 「クロノ…… クロノ！ クロノ！！！
re: 'Crono...... Crono! Crono!!!

eng: It's time to rise and shine! We have a little surprise for you!
jap: いつまでねてるつもりだ！ いいかげんに起きろ！！
re: How long do you plan on sleeping! Get up already!!

eng: Your stay of execution has been cancelled. We must now carry out your sentence.
jap: しっこうゆうよは終わりだ。 せいしきに刑をしっこうする。 城へ同行しろ。
re: You suspended sentence is over. We will formally enforce the punishment. Come with me to the castle.

eng: We've been looking for you, Crono. Where did you take my daughter?
jap: さんざん探したよ。　クロノ君。 私の娘を引っぱり回して。
re: I have searched hard. Crono-kun. You've been dragging my daughter around.

eng: Father! Stop this!
jap: 父上やめて！
re: Father, stop it!

eng: Daddy, don't!
jap: パパやめて！
re: Papa, stop it!

eng: Crono hasn't done a thing!
jap: クロノは何もしてないわ！
re: Crono hasn't done anything!

eng: She says Crono has been a perfect gentleman, but...
jap: クロノが何もしていないと 娘は言っておるが……
re: My daughter says Crono hasn't done anything, but......

eng: What do you think, Chancellor?
jap: 大臣もそう思うか？
re: Chancellor, do you think so as well?

eng: Crono's deeds have had an enormous impact on the kingdom!
jap: いいえ。 クロノ達は国の一大事に かかわる事をしました。
re: No. Crono and the others have done things that seriously affect the kingdom.

eng: Pierre, what do you think?
jap: ピエール、君もそう思うか？
re: Pierre, do you think so as well?

eng: I think Crono's been keeping himself...rather busy!
jap: いいえ。 クロノ達は国の一大事に かかわる事をしました。
re: No. Crono and the others have done things that seriously affect the kingdom.

eng: Chancellor, how could you?!
jap: 大臣まで何を言うの？
re: Chancellor, what are you saying?

eng: And just WHAT are you saying, Pierre!
jap: ピエールまで何を言うの？
re: Pierre, what are you saying?

eng: Please! Just listen to me! We had to...
jap: 話せばわかるわ！ 私が今まで城を出ていたのには わけがあるの……
re: You'll understand if we talk! There's a reason why I've been out of the castle up to now......

eng: ...save the future, right?
jap: 未来を救ったのだろう？
re: You saved the future, right?

eng: Huh??
jap: へ？
re: Huh?

eng: You saved the future, and gave us hope.
jap: 未来を救い、われわれに元気の意味を 教えてくれた……。
re: They saved the future, and taught us the meaning of healthy......

eng: You fought Magus's troops, and brought peace to the kingdom in the year 600.
jap: 魔王軍を 倒してくれた。 王国歴600年の世界にふたたび 平和がおとずれた。
re: They beat Magus's army. Peace once again came upon the world of Kingdom Year 600.

eng: Crono beat Reptites!
jap: クロ達　恐竜人　倒した！
re: Cros beat Dinomen!

eng: Wh, what's going on here?
jap: ど、どうしたの？　みんな
re: Wh, what's going on? Everyone.

eng: Lucca! You brought them here, didn't you?
jap: ルッカ…… 連れて来たのね？
re: Lucca...... You brought them, didn't you?

eng: Our kinsmen told me all about your incredible mission.
jap: お前達が 大きな使命をせおっていたこと……。 歴代のガルディア王家の血を引く者達が すべて話して下さった。
re: About the great mission you were burdened with...... Successive generations of those with the blood of the Guardia royal family have told me everything.

eng: Kinsmen?! You mean these're MY ancestors...and descendants?
jap: ガルディアの血……って みんな、私の先祖や子孫なの？
re: Guardia's blood...... you mean they're all my ancestors and descendants?

eng: Here I was fussing about my kingdom, and my daughter, and you were saving past, present and future!
jap: 平和ボケして自分の事しか考えて いなかった自分が情けない。 国のため……、この星のためを 考えなくてはならない時に。
re: I'm ashamed that I was so blinded by peace that I thought only of myself. In a time when I must think about the good of the kingdom...... the good of this planet.
RetranslatorComment: Peace-senile might be a more literal translation.

eng: Now, for a true victory parade! Tonight we celebrate...you!
jap: さあ！　戦勝パレードじゃ！ 世界を救ったヒーローを しゅくふくじゃ！
re: Now! The victory parade! We celebrate the heroes who saved the world!

eng: Now Marle, go out and enjoy the last night of the fair!
jap: さ、マールよ。 思いっきり千年祭最後の夜を 楽しんで来い！
re: Now, Marle. Come enjoy the last night of the Millenial Festival with all your might!

eng: Come along with Crono, our Hero. Princess Nadia is finally home! At last, Guardia is back to normal! It's a moonlight parade!
jap: さあ！　未来を救ったクロノと 無事お城に帰ってきたマールディア王女と そしてガルディアのますますのはってんを 願って…… イッツァ　ムーンライトパレード！
re: Now! Along with Crono, who saved the future, Wish for Princess Marledia, safely returned to the castle, and for Guardia's continued development...... It's a Moonlight Parade!
RetranslatorComment: decided to stick with proper English here after all.

eng: This is fantastic!
jap: とってもファンタスティック！
re: It's really fantastic!

eng: The princess is gorgeous! Don't get me wrong, of course you are too.
jap: 王女様きれいだな…… や、当然君もだよ。
re: The princess is beautiful...... Ah, you are too, of course.

eng: YOU saved us all?! That's nice, dear, but I wish you spent more time around the house. It's a real problem when the person who's in charge of the cat is gone!
jap: あなたが未来を救ったなんてね……。 信じられないわ。　でもね。 お母さんはお前にもっと家にいて ほしいよ。 ……ネコのめんどう見る人が いなくて大変なんだから。
re: To think you saved the future...... I can't believe it. But, you know, I want you to spend more time at home. ......it's a real pain when the person who looks after the cat isn't there.

eng: What a dreamy night... Thank you darling.
jap: こんなすてきな夜を すごせるなんて……。 あなた、ありがとう。
re: Spending such a dreamy night...... Thank you, dear.
RetranslatorComment: If her legs weren't saved, she says this.

eng: Honey, don't just be a sack of potatoes! Dance with me!
jap: あんた。 すわって飮んでばかりいないで。 私達もいっしょに踊りましょう！
re: Darling. Don't just sit and drink. Let's dance together too!

eng: Crono, the King says YOU saved the future! Wait 'till I tell my friends!
jap: あ！　クロノくん。 王様から聞いたわよ。未来を救った事。 ルッカのおさななじみが そんなすごい事をする人だったなんて。 なんかじまんしちゃいたい気分だわ。
re: Ah! Crono-kun. I heard from the king. You saved the future. To think Lucca's childhood friend was someone who would do such an amazing thing. I kind of feel like bragging.

eng: Yum! Lemonade sure tastes great outdoors!
jap: いやー 祭りで飮む酒はうめーぜ！
re: Yah, the sake you drink at a festival is great!

eng: Crono, have a sip! You're the Hero today.
jap: クロノよ。 お前もいっぱいやりなよ。 今日はヒーローなんだからよ！
re: Crono. You have a glass too. Cause today you're the hero!

eng: Not much business in weapons anymore. But I like it that way.
jap: もう刀などいらない時代が 来たのかもしれんな。 刀かじボッシュとしての役目は終わって しまうが、この星空を見ていると そんな事はどうでもよくなって しまうわい。
re: An era may have come that needs no such things as katanas. My duty as the swordsmith Bosch may be over, but as I look at this starry sky, such things no longer bother me.

eng: Well everyone, this is it.
jap: もうみんな……お別れなのよ。
re: Well, everyone...... this is goodbye.

eng: Each to thine time.
jap: みな、それぞれの時代へ。
re: Everyone, to your respective eras.

eng: The Gate has grown weak...
jap: ラヴォスが死に ゲートの力が弱まってイマス。
re: Lavos is dead, and the power of the Gates IS weakening.

eng: We've got to say our goodbyes before the Gate closes.
jap: ゲートが閉じる前に さよならを言わなきゃ。
re: We have to say goodbye before the Gates close.

eng: You're all leaving?
jap: そんな、みんな行っちゃうの？
re: No way, everyone's leaving?

eng: Crono was strong! Marle too! Ayla have fun!!
jap: クロ　強かった！ マールも　強かった！ エイラ　楽しかった！！
re: Cro was strong! Marle was strong too! Ayla had fun!!

eng: You're my distant ancestor. So you'd better have tough kids or I'll be in trouble!
jap: 遠い遠い おじいちゃま。 元気な子供を生んでね。 じゃないと私がこまっちゃうから
re: You're my distant distant grandpa. Have healthy kids. I'm gonna be in trouble if you don't.
RetranslatorComment: -chama is childish and combines the respect of -sama with the intimacy of -chan.

eng: Heh, heh! No worry. Ayla VERY strong!
jap: へへ…… だいじょうぶ！　エイラ　元気！！
re: Heh, heh...... It fine! Ayla healthy!!

eng: Right!
jap: そうね！！
re: Right!!

eng: Hey...what do you mean by that?
jap: ……って？ 何それ？？　どういう事？
re: ......huh? What's that? What do you mean?

eng: Kino dummie! We go now!
jap: キーノ　バカ！！ さ　エイラ達　行く！
re: Kino dummy!! Aylas go now!

eng: 'Tis a feisty crowd! But they are thine kin, and 'tis of consequence. Queen Leene awaits. Your Majesty, we too shall take our leave.
jap: にぎやかな連中だな。 自分の先祖かもしれないと思うと ほっといてもいられないがな……。 さあ王様、リーネ様がお待ちです。 私達も帰りましょう。
re: They're a lively bunch. But they may be your own ancestors, so you can't just be rid of them...... Come, your majesty, Leene-sama awaits. Let us also return.
RetranslatorComment: This line made so much  more sense once I realized he was talking about Ayla and Kino.

eng: Mr. Frog...
jap: カエルさん……
re: Frog-san......

eng: ... Long farewells ne'er were necessary.
jap: …… 別れに多くの言葉はいらないさ。
re: ...... I don't need many words as farewell.

eng: Right! Besides, actions speak louder than words!
jap: そう。 言葉とはかぎらないわ。
re: Right. Words aren't all there is.

eng: Yeah. Don't these things end with the princess kissing the frog?
jap: 良かったわね。 王女様のキッスで姿がもとにもどるって いうのがハッピーエンドの定番よ。
re: Thank goodness. It's a happy ending standard for someone's form to go back to normal with a princess's kiss.

eng: So...you're going to search for Schala?
jap: サラを探すの……？
re: You're searching for Sara......?

eng: Lucca, I will miss you.
jap: ルッカ ワタシも未来で元気にやっていきマス。
re: Lucca, I too WILL live healthily in the future.

eng: What's wrong Lucca? Aren't you going to say goodbye to Robo?
jap: どうしたの。　ルッカ？ ロボにお別れは……
re: What's wrong, Lucca? Say goodbye to Robo......

eng: She knows.
jap: ヤハリ気づいてたのデスネ。
re: She HAS INDEED realized.

eng: Knows...what?
jap: 何のこと？
re: What?

eng: ...... Robo was born in a bleak future. When we defeated Lavos, we changed history. Robo...may not exist in the future.
jap: …… ロボは廃墟となった未来で 生まれたわ……。 でも私達がラヴォスを倒した事に つまり新しい未来では ロボの存在は……
re: ...... Robo was born in the ruined future...... But the future ought to become bright by our defeat of Lavos. In other words, in the new Future, Robo's existence.....

eng: Ha ha. Please relax. The new future has a place for me!
jap: ハハ、そんなことないデス。 きっと新しい未来でもワタシは……
re: Ha ha, DO NOT be silly. Surely even in the new future I......

eng: Darn it, Robo! Don't pretend you don't care when you're really sad! It just makes things worse!
jap: ロボのバカ　バカ！ 悲しい時はすなおに悲しむのよ！！ こっちがよけい悲しく なっちゃうじゃない！！
re: Robo, you dummy, dummy! When you're sad, be honest about being sad!! This way just makes it even sadder!!

eng: ...... Lucca, YOU have taught me these emotions. Thank you.
jap: …… そんな思いやりの気持ちを 教えてくれたのもルッカデス。 とてもカンシャしてイマス。
re: ...... It IS also you who taught me such feelings of sympathy. I AM very GRATEFUL.

eng: Tears don't become you, Lucca! Robo'll be there in the new future!
jap: なみだは似合わないわ。 ルッカ……！ 新しい未来でも、ロボはきっと 生まれて来るわ。
re: Tears don't suit you. Lucca......! I'm sure Robo will have been born even in the new future.

eng: Good...bye.
jap: サヨウ……ナラ。
re: GOOD...... BYE.

eng: Caution! Oil has washed over my sight sensors. Sight diminished...
jap: おっと オイルでアイセンサーがかすんで……
re: Oops, my eye sensors are blurred with oil......
RetranslatorComment: The verb is usually used to mean tears fogging eyesight.

eng: Do you remember that talk we had?
jap: いつかした話 おぼえてる？
re: Do you remember the talk we had once?

eng: You mean about whether our lives flash by before we die?
jap: ええ 死ぬ時に見る思い出の話……。
re: Yeah, about how you see your memories when you

eng: Yeah. I get the feeling that the «Entity» is finally at rest.
jap: もうその人は 助かったみたいね。
re: It looks like that person is saved now.

eng: Yes, I feel that too...
jap: うん。 私も感じる。　その人のいぶきを……。
re: Yeah. I feel it too. That person's breath......

eng: Time travel...how exhausting!
jap: 時間を旅するなんて…… にが重すぎるね。
re: Travelling time...... It's too much of a burden.

eng: We should dismantle the Epoch. Its job is finished.
jap: シルバードも壊した方が 良さそうね。 もう、みんなと会えなくなるけど……。
re: It looks like we'd better break down the Sylbird too. Though we won't be able to see everyone anymore......

eng: You naughty thing, come back here!
jap: これこれ、もどってきなさい。
re: Hey, hey, get back here.

eng: Look, Crono! Your cat's running away because you haven't been feeding it!
jap: ほら、クロノ。 あなたがエサをきらしたもんだから みんな逃げ出しちゃって……。
re: Crono, look. They're all running away since you let the food run out......

eng: Hey, come back here!
jap: あ！これ！
re: Ah! Hey!

eng: Oh, great! Crono, that Gate will never open again!
jap: た、たいへん！！ クロノ！！ もうゲートは一生開かないわよ！！ どうする？
re: Oh, oh no!! Crono!! The Gate won't open again in a lifetime!! What'll we do?

eng: Well it looks like we have no choice but to go after them!
jap: そうね！ 追いかけるしかないわね！
re: That's it! There's no choice but to chase her down!

eng: Go after them?!
jap: 追いかけるって ゲートはもう……
re: Chase her down, you say, but the Gate's already......

eng: Lucca, don't turn off your brain, yet!
jap: まさかルッカ……
re: Lucca, you can't mean......

eng: I forgot! We have a Time Machine! Nya ha ha!
jap: たーいむ　マシーーン([heart])が あるじゃない！ オーッホッホッホ！
re: We've got a Time Machiiinnne{heart}! Oh ho ho ho!
RetranslatorComment: Forgot? No she didn't.

eng: Oh, Princess, the King asks for your presence.
jap: おっとマールディア様。 こんな所に。　王様がお呼びです。
re: Ah, Marledia-sama. Here you are. The king calls.

eng: I'm so happy! Now there's no reason for you to go away anymore.
jap: 私はうれしいぞ。 もうお前が遠くに行くことも ないじゃろうからな。
re: I'm glad. I shouldn't think you'll be going far away any more.

eng: I have a gift for you, to commemorate this day, Princess Nadia.
jap: マールディアよ。この日を記ねんして 私からのプレゼントじゃ。
re: Marledia. A present from me to commemorate this day.

eng: This is Nadia's Bell. It will ring out across the land.
jap: ほーら。　かわいいじゃろ。 マールディアの鐘じゃ いい音がするぞ。
re: Look. Isn't it lovely. Marledia's Bell will make a fine sound.

eng: Marle...where did you go? Could someone please lend me a hand?
jap: おいマールや……どこいった？ ほれ……誰か……手伝ってくれ。
re: Hey, Marle...... where did you go? Hey...... someone...... give me a hand.

eng: Daddy... I hate to say this but… I can't sit around doing nothing!
jap: ありがとう…… でも私。 じっとしていられないの！
re: Thanks...... But I... I can't sit around doing nothing!

eng: Phew! Made it just in time! Shall I fire one off?
jap: 王様！ 間に合いましたぜ！ 一発ドカンと行きますかい！！
re: Your majesty! I made it in time! Should I fire off a shot!?!

eng: Uh, no Taban. Actually, I could really use your help... [Ending: Beyond Time (Without Epoch)]
jap: いや、タバン。 悪いが今はそれどころじゃ……
re: No, Taban. Sorry, but it's no time for......

eng: It's...
jap: これは！
re: It's!

eng: It's Nadia's Bell, which will replace the 400 year old Leene Bell. Henceforth, Nadia's Bell will proudly ring for lasting peace.
jap: マールディアの鐘じゃよ。 400年間この国を見守り続けて来た リーネの鐘にかわって、これからは マールディアの鐘が歌をうたう……。
re: Marledia's Bell. From now on, Marledia's Bell will sing in place of Leene's Bell, which has continued to watch over this country for 400 years.

eng: It's beautiful!
jap: すてき……！

eng: Now, you can do the honors.
jap: さあ、お前がつけなさい。
re: Now, you attach it.

eng: Done!
jap: うんッ！
re: Sure!

eng: Huh?! H, hey Crono, help me!
jap: ！？ ちょ　ちょっとクロノ！
re: !? H, hey, Crono!

eng: I thought Lavos made the Gates... But I guess I was wrong.
jap: ゲートはラヴォスの力で 生まれたものと思っていたけど…… 今思うと違ってたのかもね。
re: We thought the Gates were born from Lavos's power, but...... Thinking about it now, we may have been wrong.

eng: What do you mean?
jap: どういう事？
re: What do you mean?

eng: I think a greater force wanted us to experience those events.
jap: もっと違う…… あたたかく大きな存在が いろんな時代を私達に 見せたかったんじゃないかな。
re: I wonder if another...... If a great, warm being didn't want to show us the various eras.

eng: Lavos is gone, so the Gate will shut. Return now, or you'll be lost in time.
jap: ラヴォスも死に そのうちゲートも閉じるじゃろう。 今のうちに自分の時代に帰らないと 時のさまよい人になってしまうぞい。
re: Lavos is dead, and I except the Gates will soon shut too. If you don't return to your own eras now, while you can, you'll become temporal wanderers.
RetranslatorComment: Has a sense of wandering aimlessly, so lost fits too.

eng: Let's go back in time and save Crono!
jap: 過去にもどって クロノを助けましょうよ。
re: Let's go back to the past and save Crono.

eng: Don't you care?
jap: 心配じゃないの？
re: Aren't you worried?

eng: Come on!
jap: ねえ。
re: Hey!

eng: 'Tis necessary that I return and protect Queen Leene.
jap: 私は中世でリーネ様を 守らなくては。
re: I must protect Leene-sama in the Middle Ages.

eng: Kino wait for me.
jap: キーノ達　待ってる。
re: Kinos waiting.
RetranslatorComment: Kinos meaning Kino and the others, not Kino's as in Kino is.

eng: This really is the last we will see of each other.
jap: 本当に最後のお別れデスネ。
re: This truly IS our final farewell.

eng: Ayla go home now. Good luck all!
jap: エイラ　帰る。 元気でな！
re: Ayla go home. Be healthy!

eng: Fare thee well!
jap: 達者でな。
re: Stay well.

eng: Goodbye...everyone.
jap: サヨウナラ。
re: GOODBYE.

eng: You're all so heartless!
jap: みんな、つれないわ……！
re: You're all heartless......!

eng: It's a fate we can't escape. Someday we will all pass away. Marle......
jap: 人の死は運命なのよ。 マール……。
re: Death is our fate. Marle......

eng: Hey there!
jap: おーい！
re: Hey!

eng: They've all... Have they all left?
jap: お前達…… ……って、もう行ってしまったか？
re: You all...... ......wait, they've left already?

eng: I forgot to give them this. ... ...Oh well.
jap: これがあるのをわすれてた。 ……ま、いいか。
re: I forgot I had this. ......well, no matter.

eng: They dropped this! ... ...Oh well...
jap: これ落として行ったぞ。 ……ま、いいか。
re: They dropped this and left. ......well, no matter.
RetranslatorComment: This is if the player already had the Chrono Trigger.

eng: Come on! It's the last night of the fair!
jap: さあ！　千年祭り最後の夜！！
re: Now! It's the final night of the Millennial Festival!!

eng: Have you seen Crono? He was really looking forward to this fair! Where do you suppose he is?
jap: うちの子見かけなかった？ この日を楽しみにしていたのに。 いったいどこで あぶらをうっているのかしら？
re: Have you happened to see my child? He was looking forward to this day. I wonder where on earth he's goofing off?

eng: I wonder how everyone is doing.
jap: みんな元気で やってるかな……。
re: I wonder how everyone is......

eng: Give me «Time Egg!»
jap: 『時の卵』　よこせ！
re: Give “Egg of Time”!

eng: Calm down. Rushing won't bring him back!
jap: だから落ち着けっちゅうに。 そんなにあせったら生き返るもんも 生き返らんだろうに。
re: Calm down, I said. You won't be able to bring a thing back to life if you rush like that.

eng: Ok, understand. Now hurry, give!
jap: わかったから 早く　よこせ！
re: Got it, so hurry give!

eng: Hey! He is escaping!
jap: あ！ 逃げマシタ！
re: Ah! He RAN away!

eng: What's going on, everyone?
jap: ねえねえ！ みんな！　どうしたの？
re: Hey, hey! Everyone! What's going on?

eng: That «Time Egg» of his can bring HIM back!
jap: あいつの持っている時の卵で 生き返らせる事が出来るんだ。
re: We can bring him back to life with that egg of time he's got.

eng: Bring who back? You mean Crono?
jap: 生き返らすって？ クロノの事？！
re: Bring him back to life? You mean Crono?!

eng: Yes.
jap: そうだ。
re: Yes.

eng: By the way, who...are you?
jap: ところであなた誰……
re: By the way, who are you......?

eng: He just took off.
jap: 行っちゃった。
re: They're gone.

eng: Could that have been... Frog?
jap: もしかして…… カエルじゃない？
re: Could it be...... Frog?

eng: H, he's handsome!
jap: ハ、ハンサム！
re: He, he's handsome!

eng: Let's catch up with him!
jap: 追いかけましょう！！
re: Let's go after them!!

eng: Hey Frog! Why didn't you tell us you were a dish? [Ending: Reunion (Without Epoch)]
jap: カエルってば。 ハンサムだったらハンサムって 最初っから言ってよね。
re: Oh, Frog. If you're handsome, say you're handsome in the first place.

eng: What's up?! How did everyone get here? The Gate's been shut!
jap: みんな、どうしたの？ ゲートは閉じたはずなのに。
re: What's going on, everyone? The Gates are supposed to have closed.

eng: Heh heh, I tinkered with the Telepod.
jap: 転送機を改造したのよ。
re: I remodeled the transfer machine.

eng: And made it into a time machine?
jap: タイムマシンに？
re: In the time machine?

eng: You're the guy from the End of Time!
jap: あなたは 時の最果てにいた……。
re: You were at the Farthest Reaches of Time......

eng: You forgot the «Time Egg!» The «Time Egg» is used for... blah, blah, blah... etc, etc, etc... etc, etc, etc... etc, etc, etc... ... You got that?
jap: あんたら『時の卵』を わすれておったから。 うんぬんかんぬん…… うんぬんかんぬん…… うんぬんかんぬん…… うんぬんかんぬん…… ……なんじゃ。
re: You forgot the “Egg of Time”. The “Egg of Time” is...... etc., etc., etc., etc....... etc., etc., etc., etc....... etc., etc., etc., etc....... etc., etc., etc., etc....... ......you see.

eng: You mean we can get Crono back?
jap: って事はクロノを……
re: You mean, Crono......

eng: Yes, that's possible.
jap: 生き返らせる事が 出来るかもしれんな。
re: You might be able to bring him back to life.

eng: Th, that's why you're all here?
jap: そ、そのためにみんな あつまってくれたの？
re: Th, that's what everyone's gathered for?

eng: Let's get Crono!
jap: 行こう！ クロノを取り戻しに！！
re: Let's go! To bring Crono back!!

eng: Why don't you stay here with your dad?
jap: パパのそばに いてあげなよ。
re: Be here for your papa.

eng: But...
jap: でも……

eng: Don't worry! I'll bring the idiot back!
jap: あのバカは きっと連れて来るから！
re: I'll bring that idiot back for sure!

eng: Trust me!
jap: ま・か・せ・な・さ・い！！
re: Leave – it – to – me!!

eng: ?! H, help!!
jap: ！？ ちょ　ちょっと！助けて！！
re: !? H, hey! Help me!!

eng: Good job! You finished the hardest version of the game! This is the development room for the Chrono Trigger game. Take a walk around and hear what the team has to say...
jap: こんな、こんなんな…しゃれじゃないぞ… じょうきょうでゲームをクリアしました。 ありがとうございます。 ここはクロノトリガー開発ルーム。 スタッフのみんなの声をきいてください。 では……
re: You've cleared the game in such a troublesome... I'm not joking... situation. Thank you. This is the Chrono Trigger development room. Please listen to what everyone on staff has to say. Now then......
RetranslatorComment: Just look at line two to  get the joke.  こんな、こんなんな.  Yay. Doesn't translate.

eng: Love was in the air... But then...the boat sank. Sigh...
jap: いろいろなこいを しました。そのどれもが…… ふッ……
re: I've been in love a variety of times. Every one of those...... sigh......

eng: Heh heh... the Tyrano Lair? Yup, it was my bright idea to put the switch in the mouth!
jap: ティラン城？ ごめんなさい。くちにスイッチを付け たのは、私でケロッ！
re: Tyran Castle? I'm sorry. It was me who put the switch in the mouth, ribbit!

eng: Hey that's me, the merchant-maker!
jap: すっかり　しょくにん。 R0Mは　こしで　させ。
re: Total craftsman. Make ROM with hips.
RetranslatorComment: ...I think. Too ambiguous, odd phrasing.

eng: I've been working on this ROM for 24 hrs! Aaah!! Someone save me...I'm getting sucked in!
jap: 24時間　おはようござ います。 R0Mは　わきばらで　ぬきます
re: Good morning 24 hours a day. I pull the ROM out with my sides.
RetranslatorComment: ...another possible nonsense statement.

eng: Hey, they promised to name the game Hoshino Trigger!
jap: このゲーム、ホントは ホシノトリガーってタイトルになるハズ だったんだよ。なんちゅーてねー。
re: This game was really supposed to have the title Hoshino Trigger. Just kidding.

eng: Oops! Did I forget to insert a few parts? I'm so sorry, it won't happen again...
jap: はっ！？またパーツをいれ わすれてる！？しくしく…すみません 直していいですか～～？
re: Huh!? I forgot to put some parts in again!? Waaah... I'm sorry, can I fix it~~?
RetranslatorComment: しくしく is a sobbing noise

eng: How 'bout those Dodgers?!
jap: …ん？なんばしよっとや、 きさん。せからしったい！！ ぼてくりこかされたいとや！？
RetranslatorComment: ***** eep. This looks like a  nasty combination of slang and dialect. I can't figure it out... though  frankly I'm surprised this is the only one this bad.

eng: Don't look for me... Hiroko Yamamoto
jap: 探さないで下さい。 やまもと　ひろと
re: Please don't search for me. Hiroto Yamamoto
RetranslatorComment: NOT Hiroko, doublechecked it with the game

eng: Boy isn't this fun?
jap: 旅はいいよね。 あそびもいいよね。 ふっ、楽しいこと、たくさんしよう！
re: Journeys sure are nice. Playing's nice too. Hm, let's do lots of fun things!

eng: Congrats on finishing the game. Now get a life!!
jap: おつかれさまでした！！ あしたは、外であそぼう！
re: Good job!! Let's play outside tomorrow!

eng: Legendary programmer seeks that special someone. Waiting for those cards and letters.
jap: 伝説のプログラマ　29さい 「勇者になりそこねて、伝説のみと 化してしまったのは私です。 おてがみくださいね。
re: Legendary Programmer, 29 years old “It was I who failed to become a Hero and changed to merely legendary. Please write.

eng: Boy it was a long haul... I've gotten my first grey hairs because of this game!!
jap: 長かったです。 初めてのしらががはえました。 やせました。
re: It was long. My first grey hairs have come out. I've lost weight.

eng: Hey out there in TV land! How're we doing? It's me, Manabu Daishima! If you like this game, check out the other Square Soft titles!!
jap: やあ！テレビのまえのみんな～元気かい？ ぼくが、だいしま　まなぶで～～す。 んん！！こらァ～　かりてやるな～～
re: Hey! Everyone in front of the TV, how are ya? I'm Manabu Daishima~~. Oh!! Hey~! Don't borrow that~~!

eng: Gee, you know they really kept us locked up for a long time. My hair's THIS long as a result!
jap: ふふふ…… ずっとかみのけ切らなかったら こんなにのびちゃった。切りにいこ。
re: Hu, hu, hu...... My hair's gotten this long since I haven't cut it in forever. I'm gonna go cut it.

eng: Well I hope everyone can say it was a learning experience! When you complete your rounds, come back to see me.
jap: このゲームに かかわった人々、これをやってくれた みんなが、『この』時をこえて 成長し続けますように。 一通り聞き終えたらまた私の所へきなさい。
re: May the people involved in this game, all who have done this, pass beyond "this" time and continue to grow. Come again once you're done hearing everyone.

eng: That's a pretty good costume you got on there, kid! Wait! It's really YOU, isn't it?!
jap: 良くできてるなー そのふく。 作るの大変だったでしょ？ え！ナニ？本物！？　こりゃ失礼。
re: Pretty well made, huh. Those clothes. Must have been a pain to make, right? Huh! What? They're real!? Well, excuse me.

eng: Someone kiss me!
jap: どもども、中プウだケロ。 ワールドマップのちびキャラいたケロ。 ルッカは本を読んでるケロ。 クロノは急がせてるケロ。わかるケロ？
re: Thank you, thank you, (?), ribbit. There's chibi characters on the world map, ribbit. Lucca reads a book, ribbit. Crono urges you on, ribbit. Know that, ribbit?
RetranslatorComment: 中プウ eludes me, sounds like nonsense.

eng: Isn't 32 megs great? The graphics become incredible. It was painful at times, but it sure was fun!
jap: 32めがって、いーーっ ぱいえがはいるんだぞ。 大変なんだぞ。 でも、楽しかったかな。
re: 32 megs holds a lo------------ ---ot of images. It's a pain. But I guess it was fun.

eng: It'll cost you 10,000,000G to fix a broken map!
jap: 壊れたマップの修理？ 10000000Gかかるぜ。
re: Fixing a broken map? It's going to take 10,000,000G.

eng: Want to see a Chrono Trigger 2? Yes. No. That'd be nice huh?
jap: 『ねーねー2ができるってホント？』 はい いいえ 『できたらいいよね～』
re: “Hey, hey, is it true we're making a 2?” Yes No “I hope we do make it~”

eng: Every night will have a day. Even forever has to come to an end. ...I think...
jap: ふりやまないあめは、ない。 永遠にも、おわりがある……。 たぶん……。
re: There is no rain that does not stop falling. Even eternity has an end...... Maybe......
RetranslatorComment: Sounds like the Nun's line.

eng: Thank you, thank you, no applause necessary, just send money... Another of my masterpieces will be available soon, so stay tuned.
jap: ども、どもっ！ ボクのイベント、楽しんでもらえた？ 次の作品でも『まつはらえんしゅつ』が サクレツするので、よろしく！！
re: Thank you, thank you! Did you enjoy my event? “Matsuhara Production” is going to explode in the next work too, look forward to it!!

eng: Did you figure out the Poyozo Dance attack? See you again in the next game.
jap: やあみんな　おいらの 必殺技ポヨゾーダンス　みつけたかな？ またつぎの作品で会おうネ！！
re: Hey everyone, find my deathblow tech, Poyozo Dance? Let's meet again in the next work!!

eng: Shh, I'm in the middle of something good here!
jap: 「話しかけるな！いまいいとこなんだ！
re: “Don't talk to me! I'm at a good part right now!
RetranslatorComment: Between the line, the  sprite's positioning, and the noises that come with it... well, I'd rather  not say what it sounds like. Potty humor++

eng: Feed me! They've kept me locked up for so long!
jap: きゃたきゃたきゃたきゅた([heart]) ひるるるるるるっぴどーーんんっっ！ はらはらはらはら[note]はらへったよう！
re: Kyata, kyata, kyata, kyuta([heart]) Hi, ru, ru, ru, ru, ru, ru, pidohhhhnnhh!
RetranslatorComment: scurrying noises, I think

eng: So which is it, the Raiders or the Cowboys?
RetranslatorComment: some sort of gambling?

eng: Congratulations! Now wasn't that fun?
jap: クリアおめでとう！！ おもしろかった？
re: Congratulations on clearing the game!! Was it interesting?

eng: Kokubo and I've been polishing up on our anti-stress massage technique...
jap: しごともせずにこくぼ さんとくんずほぐれつもみあってました ……………………かたもみの話だよ
re: Me and Kokubo-san have been going at it and not even doing our jobs. .....................I'm talking about shoulder massages.
RetranslatorComment: As far as I can make out,  kunzu hoguretsu refers to intense movement together and apart, like in  wrestling or... well, that can be sort of like wrestling too. Potty humor++

eng: If you thought this was tough, get a load of Final Fantasy 2
jap: こんどは死なないぞ！ だいじょうぶだ、安心しろ。 死にたいヤツはFF4をやってみろ。 死ぬぞ～
re: Don't die this time! It's fine, don't worry. If you wanna die, try playing FF4. You'll die~

eng: Well I'm glad they gave me a bit part in this game...
jap: このゲームに 少しでもさんかできたことを うれしく思います。
re: I'm glad I could participate in this game, even if it was only a little.

eng: Bet you can't beat the score of 2110 in the bike race!
jap: バイクレースの プログラマーの最高ウイニングポイント は2110らしい。
re: I hear the programmers' top winning score in the bike race is 2110.

eng: Wow, you just jetted through the game huh? Let me throw you a kiss!
jap: クロノトリガー最後まで あそんでくれてありがとう。 そんなあなたにプレゼント。ちゅう([heart])
re: Thanks for playing Chrono Trigger through to the end.

eng: Aaack! I'm so tired... No, I'm hungry... No, I can't decide... Acck! They've made me into a zombie, working on this game...
jap: ウゥ～ン… あー眠い…　　うーおなか空いた… とりあえず、ねよっと。
re: Uhhhhn... Ah, I'm sleepy... Ohh, I'm hungry... Guess I'll sleep for now.

eng: You finished the game already? What about all the work I put in it!?
jap: クロノトリガーシリーズ だい128作目　感動のストーリー…… おやっ　また時代が違ったようじゃの
re: The 128th work in the Chrono Trigger series, a moving story...... Whoops, looks like I've got the wrong era again.

eng: Hey don't mess with the monsters I created! They kinda grow on you after awhile you know?
jap: 今年、全てのかぜをひい たな～。　へぶしゅっ！！ 最後に強くなった君たち、モンスターを へぶしゅっあまりいじめないでね。
re: I've caught all the colds this year... ACHOO!! Don't bully the monsters too much now that you've gotten strong at the end.

eng: Look closely and you'll appreciate the individuality of the monsters. Check out the shadow on this guy's sword!
jap: よ～く見るとモンスター にも小さなこだわりが。あっ、ホラホラ コイツの剣のカゲとかさァ……ね？ね？
re: Take a gooood look, and even the monsters have little things we fussed over. Hey, look, look, like the shadow on this guy's sword......see? See?

eng: Can you do it? THE 9999 damage point strike!
jap: めざせ！ 9999ダメージ！！ ばくはつ！
re: Go for it! 9999 damage!! BOOM!

eng: Well, it's my turn to go on a journey!
jap: 僕は旅に出るんだ 遠い、へんきょうの地へ・・・それは 次へのステップ・アップのために。 でも、二度と戻ってこなかったりして
re: I'm going on a journey, to a far, remote land... it's for the next step up. But what if I can't come back again?

eng: I've lost 22 pounds because of this game. You'd better be enjoying it!
jap: やせました……… 10キロ……
re: Lost weight......... 10 kilos......
RetranslatorComment: which is about 22 pounds

eng: Like, does this mean we're finally free to go home?
jap: おいらはマッパーみならいさ 親方なら、ゲーセンで対戦やってるよ。
re: I'm an apprentice mapper. If you're looking for the boss, he's waging war at the game center.
RetranslatorComment: Parallels the apprentice carpenters in Choras.

eng: Ever since I started growing out my hair I've been getting a lot of attention...from guys! Yikes!
jap: られるのよね。しかも男に…………』 超ショッーーク！！
re: when I grow out my hair. From men even............” Super shockkkkk!!
RetranslatorComment: 声をかける is literally just 'call out to', but it has connotations of hitting on or trying to pick up someone. Amazing that this one made it past the censors.

eng: Sorry, it's a bad makeup day for Takashi Tokita.
jap: 「あ、すいません。 今マスク付けてないんで…… ときた　たかしは リバプールの風になりましたから。
re: Oh, excuse me. I'm not wearing my mask right now...... Takashi Tokita has gone Liverpool style.
RetranslatorComment: No idea what it's supposed to mean, but that's the line.

eng: Will you be my friend? Are you a girl? Yes No
jap: あそんでくれて ありがとね。ところでキミは女の子？ はい いいえ
re: Thanks for playing. By the way, are you a girl? Yes No
RetranslatorComment: Incidentally, Yukio sounds like a female name, and the line sounds female as well.

eng: Now wasn't that SPECIAL? See you same time, new game!
jap: いかがでしたか？ 楽しんでいただければしあわせです。 では、ほかのゲームでお会いしましょう
re: How was it? We are pleased if you found it enjoyable. Now, let us meet in another game as well.
RetranslatorComment: Very formal, especially notable since most of these are very... not. Not rude, just kind of conversational and often silly.

eng: 3...... 2... ... 1...... Restart! Just joking!
re: 3...... 2......   1...... Reset!! Kidding, kidding.

eng: Phew, what a relief it's over!
jap: はじめての しごとでした。 キンチョーしながらかきました。
re: This was my first job. I was nervous as I wrote it.

eng: Good job guys!
jap: ほんの ちょっぴり　おてつだいしました。 くろとりチームのかた。 おつかれさまでした。
re: I helped out just a wee bit. I'm from the Blackbird team. Good job.

eng: Did you get through all 10 different endings? It depends on when you challenge Lavos.
jap: エンディングは 10しゅるい以上。シナリオのどの タイミングでラヴォスを倒したかに よってかわるよ。 全部見ることができたかな？。
re: There are over ten different endings. It changes depending on when in the scenario timing you beat Lavos. I wonder if you can see them all?

eng: Well are we having fun yet?
jap: 楽しんで かきました。　どうでしたか？
re: I had fun writing it. How was it?

eng: Mission complete!
jap: おつかれさまです。
re: Good job.

eng: Better find the switch soon or it'll all go up in flames!
jap: 早くスイッチを さがさないと……もえちゃうよ！
re: If you don't hurry and find the switch......it's gonna burn!

eng: Well then, open the Gates to the Dream Team!
jap: では…… ドリームプロジェクトへの扉を開こう！
re: Now then...... Let's open the door to the Dream Project!

eng: C'mon in. We've been expecting you!
jap: 中へどうぞ。 最高のプロジェクトスタッフが 待っておるぞ。
re: Go on inside. The ultimate project staff are waiting.

eng: Heeey! Sasuke! Kikka! Pop's working on games like this! Hey are you guys watching? Isn't this great?!
jap: おーい！ さすけ！きっか！おとうさんはこんな ゲームのしごともしてるんだぞー！ この画面見てるか？すごいだろー！ どうだー！
re: Hey! Sasuke! Kikka! Your dad's even working on games like this! You looking at this screen? Amazing, right! How about it!?
RetranslatorComment: Following the convention of placing given names first in English

eng: One of these things is not like the others... A Stapler, Mothra, and the Olympics. SO...which one is it?
jap: にたもの　3たくです。 ホッチキス、モスラ、オリンピック 仲間はずれは　どれ？
re: A three-choice question. Stapler, Mothra, Olympics. Which one doesn't fit?

eng: Boy, it used to be that I'd get thinner after each game. Now I'm gaining weight instead. Ack! I must be getting old.
jap: 前は1つ 作り終えるとやせてたんだけど…… 最近は、ふとっちゃうのよ。 トホホ……　としかしらねえ～
re: Before I'd get thinner when we finished making one...... But lately, I'm getting thicker. I don't know anything but...... oh no.
RetranslatorComment: トホホ  is sort of an upset or ashamed laugh. I've tried to get the meaning, but...

eng: Guess what! I hit the 100,000 yen jackpot!
jap: 年まつジャンボ 10万円　当たった。
re: I won the 100,000 yen year-end jumbo.
RetranslatorComment: About $1000 US

eng: siht daer naht od ot retteb gnihton evah I Now run out side and play, boys and girls!
jap: 『ェめだゃじんよ。』 さァ！ぎゃくからよんでみよう！！
re: “Daer t'nod.” Now! Try reading it backwards!!

eng: Cheers! You made it to one of the endings! You're now a member of the Dream Team! And since you blew through the game so fast, we have adjusted the credits to suit your style!
jap: よくぞクリアしました。 あなたもドリームプロジェクトのメンバー の一人です。おめでとう！！ こんなにはやくクリアしちゃうほど せっかちなあなたにふさわしい スタッフロールをおとどけします。 さあ！　かっとべ！！
re: Well done! You've cleared the game. You're one of the Dream Project members too. Congratulations!! We're sending a staff roll fitting to how impatient you are, clearing the game this quickly. Now! Let's roll!!

eng: Princess! Wearing our disguise again, are we?
jap: あ、王女さま。 また今日も変装してお出かけですかい？
re: Oh, Princess. Are you going out in disguise again today?

eng: My, your majesty, you look splendid!
jap: まあ、王女さま。 お上手なおけしょうですわ。
re: Oh my, the Princess. Such skillful makeup.

eng: Princess! I see you're dressing...normally again!
jap: 王女さま。 また私達と同じかっこうしている。
re: Princess. You're looking like us again.

eng: Something doesn't look right...
jap: 何か様子がへんね？
re: Something seems weird, doesn't it?

eng: Let's return to the castle!
jap: お城に帰ってみましょ。
re: Let's try going back to the castle.

eng: Father! What's wrong with the townspeople!?
jap: 父上！ 町の人の様子が何か変なの。
re: Father! Something's weird about the townspeople.

eng: Where have you been, Nadia? First, calm down. And why those clothes?
jap: どこに行ってたマールディアよ？ お前もピョンピョンあそび回ってばかり いないで少しは落ち着きなさい。 あ、また人間の姿になんか変装して…。
re: Where have you been, Marledia? Don't just keep hopping around having fun, calm down a little. Ah, you're disguising yourself in human form again...
RetranslatorComment: Yes, hopping. Yes, like a frog.

eng: Everybody keeps saying that! What do you mean?
jap: みんなそう言うけど…… それってどういう意味？
re: Everyone's saying that...... What's that supposed to mean?

eng: What ARE you babbling about? You needn't keep dressing that way!
jap: 何をとぼけているんだ。 お前もそんな無理なかっこうをして いないで楽にならんか。
re: What are you playing dumb for? Wouldn't it be easier on you not to force yourself to look like that?

eng: You're just in time! We found this 400 year old wedding album in the treasury.
jap: ちょうどよかった。 これから400年前の先祖の けっこんしきのフィルムを 見ようと思ってな。 宝物庫をかたづけていたら 見つかったんじゃ。
re: Good timing. I was just thinking of watching the wedding film of our ancestors from 400 years ago. We found it when we were cleaning up the treasure vault.

eng: ??? Garble...gurgle...choke...hack...
jap: ？？　ゲコゲコゲコ……
re: ?? cough, hack, gag......

eng: Marle! No! Tell me you didn't...
jap: マール？？ あなたもしや……
re: Marle?? You couldn't be......

eng: Nooo! This can't be!!
jap: やだやだ！　こんなの！！
re: Ew, ew! No way!!

eng: Magus!!
jap: 魔王……ッ！！

eng: Phew... You're pretty stubborn.
jap: ふーッ…… なかなかしぶといわねえ。
re: Phew...... This's awfully stubborn.

eng: My apologies, Lucca...
jap: スミマセン、ルッカ……。
re: I AM SORRY, Lucca......

eng: It's not your fault. We're the one's who created weapons...
jap: あんたのせいじゃないでしょ。 この体に武器をつけたのは、私達人間 なんだから。
re: It's not your fault, is it? It was we humans who put weapons on this body.

eng: Man, that fool sleeps a lot. We should make him help us!
jap: しっかし、よくねるわねえ。 このバカ……。 おこして手伝わせようかしら。
re: But I'm amazed he's sleeping. That idiot...... I wonder if we should wake him and make him help.
RetranslatorComment: The NA version assumes 'yoku' to mean 'often' here, but I think 'well' (adverb of 'good') is more likely. I've seen it elsewhere to express frustration and sort of a grudging respect for what someone else manages to do. The feeling is sort of a 'how can he possibly just fall asleep?'

eng: No!
jap: 「ダメ！
re: Don't!

eng: Let him sleep He fought long and hard.
jap: ねかせておいてあげようよ。 あれだけの戦いの後だもん。
re: Let's let him sleep. That was really some battle after all.

eng: Phew...all right.
jap: フ……　はいはい。
re: sigh...... fine, fine.

eng: Where're you going? We just got cozy.
jap: どこ行くの？ せっかく、おちゃ入れたのに。
re: Where're you going? We've gone to the trouble of making tea.

eng: Gotta take care of some business...
jap: なに、ちょいとヤボ用でな。
re: Oh, just some minor little business.

eng: Tee, hee...
jap: プッ……
re: Phooey......

eng: Grow up...! Finally, we've got someone who wants to die young!
jap: 「おろかな…… 「ひさかたぶりに、死に急ぐ者が あらわれたか！
re: Foolish...... It's been a long since since someone rushing to die has appeared!

eng: Harhar, this is hilarious...! So, you think YOU can take us on?
jap: 「(フフン)、ずいぶんとナメてくれちゃって …… 「一人であたいとやろうなんてネ！
re: (giggle), you're SO underestimating me...... Trying to beat me by yourself, as if!

eng: Y, you're...!!
jap: 「お、お前は……！！

eng: Neuga, ziena, zieber, zom... Now the chosen time has come... Exchange this world for...!
jap: 「ダ・ズマ・ラフア・ロウ・ライラ…… つむがれよ、天と地のはざまに…… 「この大地の命と引きかえに……！
re: Da zuma lafwa roh laira...... Be spun, betwixt heaven and earth...... In exchange for this earth's life......!

eng: So, you came...
jap: やはり来たか……。
re: So you really did come......

eng: We Wizards and humans have brought about our own ruin... Except for you and I, this world is populated by cretins... The one who wins this battle... ...will rule the world... No, make that RULE THE FUTURE...
jap: わが魔族も人間も あらかた命を落とした……。 私とお前以外で生きているのは 虫ケラも同然……。 この戦いが終わった時 生きていた方が世界を…… いや、未来を手にするわけだ……。
re: Both humans and we Demons have in large part let their lives drop...... Those aside from you and I who live are like unto worms...... The one who lives when this battle ends will take the world...... No, take the future in his hands......
RetranslatorComment: Generally meaning dying,  but I like the imagery, so I kept it. He could literally mean that most are  dead, or he could mean that they're so insignificant, or lacking in the  qualities needed to bring about change and shape the future, that they are  effectively 'dead' despite living.

eng: So that's the story... But who cares.
jap: らしいな……。 だが、そんな事はどうでもいい。
re: Looks that way...... But I don't care either way about such things.

eng: But there is some merit to fighting you! ...
jap: きさまと戦う事に意味が あるのだ……！
re: There is meaning in fighting you......!

eng: Hmmmm... You have the Masamune... Let's see if you know how to use it...
jap: ほう……。 きさまがグランドリオンを……。 よかろう、かかって来い……
re: Oh......? The Grandleon, you...... Very well, come at me......
RetranslatorComment: these lines are the same as in the normal storyline

eng: Crono...... Crono! Wake up, Crono!
jap: 「クロノ…… クロノ！ クロノったら！
re: 'Crono...... Crono! Hey, Crono!!

eng: It's time to rise and shine! Dreams are for sleepers, son!
jap: いつまでねてるの？ いいかげん起きなさい！
re: How long are you sleeping? Get up already!

eng: Dear me! I'd forgotten how beautiful Leene's Bell sounds!
jap: ああ、リーネの鐘があんなに 気持ちよさそうに歌ってる。
re: Ahh, Leene's Bell is singing so pleasantly.

eng: You were so excited about the Millennial Fair that you didn't sleep well, did you...? I want you to behave yourself today!
jap: どうせゆうべ、こうふんして ねつけなかったんでしょ？ ま、建国千年のお祭りだから 無理ないけど…… あんまり調子に乗って ハシャぎすぎるんじゃないわよ！
re: I'll bet you wound up too excited to get to sleep last night, didn't you? Well, it's the National Foundation Millennial Festival, so that's only natural, but...... Don't get caught up in the moment and party too much!

eng: Now, get out of that bed!
jap: さ、いいかげん起きなさい！
re: Come on, get up already!

eng: If history is to change, let it change! If the world is to be destroyed, so be it! If my fate is to be destroyed... I must simply laugh!! I'm coming, Lavos!
jap: 「歴史が変わるというなら、変われ！ 世界がほろぶというなら、ほろべ！ そのために、今この俺が 消えてなくなるというのなら…… それはそれで、おもしろい！！ 「行くぞ、ラヴォス！！
re: If history is to change, change! If the world is to be destroyed, be destroyed! If I am thus to vanish and be no more...... That in itself will be interesting!! Here we go, Lavos!

eng: What! This's ending already?
jap: 「ええーっ！ もう、終わっちゃうの……。
re: Huuuh!? It's already over......?

eng: That's what that word usually means!
jap: 「この言葉が出たら、たいがい終わりっ てことらしいわよ。
re: From what I've heard, when these words show up, it generally means it's the end.

eng: But things were just starting to get interesting!
jap: 「せっかく、これからだったのに。
re: And we worked so hard for what comes next.

eng: Well, come on folks, let's do the «ending» thing.
jap: 「じゃあ、このエンドの文字、上げても らいましょう。
re: Well then, let's get them to raise these end words.

eng: ROLL THE CREDITS! But first, let's remember all the fun things we did!
jap: 「上げろっ、上げろっ！ はんせい会いってみましょーっ！
re: Raise them, raise them! Let's try having a review meeting!

eng: Okay! Let the ultimate slide show begin!
jap: 「美術さん、おねがーい！
re: If you please, artist-san!

eng: First, let's see a close up of Leene Square!
jap: 「まずは、リーネ広場にズームイン！
re: First, zoom in on Leene Square!

eng: There's the Steel Runner.
jap: 「てっかめんランナーね。
re: It's the Iron-Masked Runner.

eng: I've never understood why anyone would want to run for 3 hours at a stretch...
jap: 「あたし、こーゆうの苦手なんだよ！ かたそうだし……。
re: I've got a weakness for this type! He looks hard, for one thing......

eng: Forget that! Can you imagine what the inside of that armor must smell like?
jap: 「走るだけじゃね……、あのヨロイは、 ハンディキャップなのにね。
re: He just runs...... even though that armor's a handicap.

eng: What a lovely thought, Lucca. Let's get on with the show, OKAY?!
jap: 「また今度ってとこね。バイバーイ！
re: See you next time, I guess. Bye-bye!

eng: Next let's visit Guardia Castle, your home.
jap: 「次はガルディア城、あんた家よ。
re: Next is Guardia Castle, your home.

eng: Goodness! VERY nice scenery!
jap: 「へへっ、カッコいいのをそろえたわ！
re: Heh, heh, he's got his coolness all in order!

eng: But of course, my dear!
jap: 「さすがね。私もうドキドキしちゃう！
re: Fitting for a soldier. My heart's already racing!

eng: I guess you never took a shot at him, right? Say, didn't he just wink at you?
jap: 「彼だけには、どっかんピストル使わな かったでしょ。 彼の名前はピーター。でも女なの。
re: He's the only one you didn't use your blast pistol on, right? His name's Peter. But he's a woman.

eng: RELAX, Marle!!
jap: 「ぐらっ！ 私、その気はないわよ！！
re: Ghrah! I'm NOT into girls!!
RetranslatorComment: What is it with Lucca and  bisexual jokes? The same thing happens when she meets Ayla.

eng: Hey! It's Pierre!
jap: 「ぎゃーっ！！　ピエールよ！
re: Gyahh!! It's Pierre!

eng: Wouldn't want anything to do with someone like HIM. Too shifty... He should be put on trial!
jap: 「ぜーったいダメ、こーゆータイプ。 もっと正しい裁判をするべきよ！！
re: Absoluuutely no good, this type. You've got to have a more honest trial!!

eng: Come on, Lucca! Live it up a little! Let your hair down! Get Crazy!!!
jap: 「ほら、コンジョウがないわよね。 自分達でなんとかしよう！っていう 『元気』出してよ、『元気』！！
re: Look, he's got no guts. Show some, Let's do something by ourselves!, kinda cheering "vitality", "vitality"!!

eng: Yeah, thanks PRINCESS. I'll take that under advisement!!
jap: 「同じ立場だったら、こーなってるかも よ。『元気』出せーっ！！
re: If we were in the same situation, we might get like that. Show some "vitality"!!

eng: There's the seed. Hope it grows...
jap: 「たね。　育つといいね……。
re: The seeds. I hope they grow......

eng: Theeeeere's Johnny... Mr. Speed himself!
jap: 「ジョニーか……。スピードに全てをか ける男か……。
re: Johnny......? The man who bets everything on speed......?

eng: Someone ought to tell him to take a permanent pit stop. Look at that hair!
jap: 「はやいだけってのもね……。
re: All he is is fast, too......

eng: Hey, check it out! He's really a tricycle! Pass him!
jap: 「なーんだ、よく見ると三りんしゃよ！ パス、パス！
re: What's this, if you look closely he's a tricycle! Pass, pass!

eng: Try again when you learn to RIDE.
jap: 「勝とうなんて！　一万年早いわね。
re: Trying to win! Try again in ten thousand years.

eng: There's that stuffed-shirt, Cyrus!
jap: 「ちょーカッコつけ男っ、サイラス君！
re: It's the ultra-cool-acting man, Cyrus-kun!

eng: He IS pretty handsome, though...
jap: 「でも事実カッコいいから、まいっちゃ うんだな……。
re: But since he really is cool, you'll fall for him......

eng: But WHERE does he buy his clothes?
jap: 「ファッションセンスがちょっとね。
re: His fashion sense is kinda off.

eng: Hey, did you hear? He plucks his eyebrows!
jap: 「知ってた？ まゆをかいてるらしいんだって。
re: Did you know? I hear his eyebrows are penciled in.

eng: You've GOT to be joking! But...he's still a hunk!
jap: 「うっそ！　げーっ、きもちわりー！ でも、勇かんだから許しちゃおっと！
re: No way! Geeeh, I feel sick! But, he's heroic, so I'll forgive him!

eng: Hi, Toma! Now HE'S definitely my type!
jap: 「トマちゃん。あたいのお気に入り！
re: Toma-chan. My fave!

eng: Aw, he's just a flake.
jap: 「ただの酒のみよ。
re: He's just another heavy drinker.

eng: Probably has a dozen girlfriends.
jap: 「それに、女好きだったりして。
re: Besides, what if he's a woman-chaser?

eng: Actually, I see him as more of an intellectual!
jap: 「ひょっとしたら男好きだったりして！
re: What if maybe he's a man-chaser!
RetranslatorComment: Another bisexual joke  involving Lucca! As least it's not ABOUT her this time...

eng: What about him? That Kino guy?
jap: 「あんたどう思う？ このキーノっていうヤツ……。
re: What do you think? This Kino guy......

eng: Total Neanderthal! Throw him a bone!
jap: 「ナヨナヨ族ね。 ぜんぜんきょうみないわ。
re: He's a wuss. No interest whatsoever.

eng: But he's honest. That's kind of attractive.
jap: 「でも、いちずな所が、かわいいって感 じ。ウソだけど……。
re: But, he's got kinda of a cute feeling to him in his eagerness. That's a lie, though......

eng: He walks like a DUCK!!
jap: 「あるき方がキライ！　変だわっ！！
re: I hate the way he walks! It's weird!!

eng: Well, he'll never hurt anyone.
jap: 「でもいいヤツだったよね。
re: But he was a good guy.

eng: He's really very gentle, isn't he?
jap: 「とってもやさしいヤツだったよね。
re: He was a really nice guy.

eng: Crono!!!
jap: 「クロノ！！！
re: Crono!!!

eng: What ARE you two doing?! I thought you said something about a nice little slide show?
jap: 「いったいどのあたりが 『はんせい会』なんだよ！？
re: Just what part of this is a "review meeting," huh!?

eng: So, we got a little carried away!
jap: 「えへへへっ！
re: Eh, heh, heh, heh!
RetranslatorComment: Guilty nervous laughter.

eng: Where do you want to go next?!
jap: 「ねえ、次はどの時代へ行く！？
re: Hey, which era are we going to next!?

eng: Some place fun!!
jap: 「楽しいことがいっぱいの時代っ！！
re: An era that's full of fun things!!

eng: How about into the «now» ?!
re: Now!

eng: Now, as in the present?
jap: 「今って……？ 今、この現代ってこと？
re: Now, you said......? Now, meaning the Present?

eng: Okay! Back to the present!
jap: 「オッケー！　現代ね！
re: Okay! The Present!

eng: So I guess we don't need a Gate Key anymore, right?
jap: 「じゃあ、ゲートホルダーはもういらな いってことかなあ……？
re: Well then, I wonder if this means we don't need the Gate Holder any more......?

eng: Hey! Wait a sec!!!
jap: 「あっ！　待ってよーっ！！
re: Ah! Wait uuuuup!!

jap: バッカじゃないの？
re: Isn't that stupid?
RetranslatorComment: Or “aren't you stupid/an idiot”

jap: 「いいかげんにしろよ！！
re: Cut it out already!!

jap: 「クロノ！　だーいすき！！
re: Crono! I looove you!!
RetranslatorComment: Not necessarily romantically, but usually.

jap: 「あたしもっ！
re: Me too!
RetranslatorComment: End of unused lines.

eng: Direct attack on Truce!!
jap: ト！　トルースに直撃です！！
re: D—direct hit on Truce!!

eng: Calm down! How does it look down there?
jap: 落ち着け！ かくちのじょうきょうはどうだ？
re: Calm down! How's the situation elsewhere?

eng: Porre...Choras...Medina...! Everything's been destroyed!!
jap: パレポリも！　チョラスも！ メディーナも……！ ほぼ、かいめつじょうたいです！！
re: Parepoley too! And Choras! And Medina......! They're practically destroyed!!

eng: Director! We're under attack!
jap: 所長！　ここも危険です！
re: Director! It's dangerous here too!

eng: Take cover in the ShelterDome!
jap: そういんシェルタードームに たいひせよ……。
re: All hands, evacuate to the shelter dome......

eng: Director! Sir, you must come with us!
jap: 所長！　所長は！？
re: Director! Director, what about you!?

eng: We're out of time! Get moving!!
jap: 時間がない！　急がんか！！
re: There's no time! Hurry!!

eng: Y, yes sir!
jap: ハ、ハッ！
re: Y, yes sir!

eng: ... Lavos...
jap: …… ラヴォス……。
